T02D1660:396a-29: dang thugs dang p'u dza dang yon tan dang lnga

T02D1660:396a-32: rin chen dbang phyug sku'i bdag nyid yin no //
T02D1660:396a-33: de dag dang ni dga' spyad na //
T02D1660:396a-34: zhes pa rigs lnga'am gsum gyi lha mo de rnams
T02D1660:396a-35: dang dga' ba gnyis kyis ting nge 'dzin spyod na
T02D1660:396a-36: / 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro lding zhes pa lha'i rgyal po'i dngos grub dang /
T02D1660:396a-37: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mi mnyam pa zhes pa
T02D1660:396a-38: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dngos
T02D1660:396a-39: grub tshe 'di nyid la thob pa yin no //
T02D1660:396a-40: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D1660:396a-41: bskyed rim rdul tshon gyi mandala mtshan ma thob nas dngos grub len pa'am /
T02D1660:396a-42: rdzogs rim lus dang bha ga dang chos kyi dbyings kyi mandala tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D1660:396b-0: pho nya'i gtsang sbra @396b gnyis kyis dngos grub sgrub
T02D1660:396b-1: pa na sgrub pa'i thabs ni lam dang po de
T02D1660:396b-2: nyid snang ba gnyis pa thabs mang ba /
T02D1660:396b-3: gsum pa zab pas dngos grub 'di blangs nas sems
T02D1660:396b-4: can gyi don phrin las zhes bya bar gsungs pa
T02D1660:396b-5: yin no // brtag pa gsum pa'i 'grel ba'o /
T02D1660:396b-8: // / de ltar zab pa bstan nas dbang po rnon po'i
T02D1660:396b-9: dbang du byas pa mchog gi dngos grub bshad pa
T02D1660:396b-11: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:396b-12: dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1660:396b-13: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor
T02D1660:396b-15: lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1660:396b-16: zhes pa phyag rgya dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
T02D1660:396b-17: skal pa bzang mchog 'dod pa ste //
T02D1660:396b-18: zhes dbang bskur ba'i gang zag gi dngos grub 'dod pa'o //
T02D1660:396b-19: yang dag sbyor bas bde myong ba //
T02D1660:396b-20: zhes pa rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i dga'
T02D1660:396b-21: ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin zag med kyi bde ba
T02D1660:396b-22: myong ba'o // 'dod chags ther zug rtag pa can //
T02D1660:396b-23: zhes pa 'dod chags ni zag med kyi bde ba'o //
T02D1660:396b-24: ther zug ni mngon sum gyis nyams su myong ba'i
T02D1660:396b-25: don de ltar 'ba' zhig rtogs pa 'das pa dang
T02D1660:396b-27: ma byung ba med pas na rtag pa'o //
T02D1660:396b-28: de'i spyod pa bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:396b-29: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen du //
T02D1660:396b-30: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:396b-31: zag med kyi gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya la spyod pa'o //
T02D1660:396b-32: sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub pa //
T02D1660:396b-33: zhes pa pha rol tu phyin pa dang gzungs dang
T02D1660:396b-34: sa rnams kyis bskal pa gsum gyi dngos grub kyang
T02D1660:396b-36: lha dang mi'i ris su skyes pa'i skal ba bzang
T02D1660:396b-37: po'i ye shes las skyes pa'i sngags dang zhing skyes
T02D1660:396b-38: las lta smos kyang ci dgos //
T02D1660:396b-39: lha yi dngos grub dga' ba dang //
T02D1660:396b-40: zhes pa'i 'jig rten gyi dngos grub /
T02D1660:396b-41: sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po //
T02D1660:396b-42: zhes pa ma chag gi dngos grub /
T02D1660:396b-43: skal pa bzang po bde ba stong zhes pa /
T02D1660:397a-0: zag med kyi bde ba 'dod pas phyag rgya'i bde ba so sor des zag pa @397a * //
T02D1660:397a-1: med pa'i ye shes grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:397a-2: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:397a-3: las dang po pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:397a-4: dngos po thams cad las byung ba //
T02D1660:397a-5: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1660:397a-6: kun du bzang po'i rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la spyad par bya'o //
T02D1660:397a-7: he ru ka yi spyod pa ni //
T02D1660:397a-8: rdo rje can gyis mchog grub dang //
T02D1660:397a-9: zhes pa ni khro bo dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i
T02D1660:397a-10: rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi dang zag med
T02D1660:397a-12: padma gar dbang gi spyod pa ni /
T02D1660:397a-13: 'jig rten dbang po mchog gi dpa' //
T02D1660:397a-15: gos dkar mo dang mthun pa phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o //
T02D1660:397a-16: rnam snang gi spyod pa ni sangs rgyas dag la
T02D1660:397a-17: bde ba dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1660:397a-18: smos te / sangs rgyas phyag rgya'i rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o //
T02D1660:397a-19: rdo rje nyi ma'i spyod pa ni /
T02D1660:397a-20: khams gsum dag na ma lus pa //
T02D1660:397a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1660:397a-22: m'a ma k'i'i rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o //
T02D1660:397a-23: rta mchog gi spyod pa ni /
T02D1660:397a-24: sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po //
T02D1660:397a-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1660:397a-26: sgrol ma dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o //
T02D1660:397a-27: de ltar mchog gi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi lha mo bshad nas /
T02D1660:397a-28: 'jig rten gyi dngos grub kyi bsam gtan gyi lha mo bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:397a-29: mthu chen la ni bkra shis brtan //
T02D1660:397a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1660:397a-32: bkra shis brtan ni de'i chung ma'o //
T02D1660:397a-33: 'phrog las ni dbang phyug chen po'o //
T02D1660:397a-34: grub pa ni lha mo au ma'o //
T02D1660:397a-35: ngan pa las ni 'dod pa'o lha'o //
T02D1660:397a-36: dga' ba zhes pa de'i chung ma'o //
T02D1660:397a-37: ngo mthon stobs kyis phrogs nas zhes pa mngon sum du bkug nas bdag nyid longs spyod pa dang /
T02D1660:397a-40: tshogs 'khor byed pa'i dad pa la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1660:397a-41: de ltar btsun mo rin po che bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02D1660:397b-1: ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid //
T02D1660:397b-2: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1660:397b-3: khams gsum gyi bdag po la longs spyod thams cad
T02D1660:397b-4: phrogs nas bdag nyid kyang longs spyod cing dad pa
T02D1660:397b-6: rgyal srid bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02D1660:397b-8: tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen gyi //
T02D1660:397b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:397b-10: lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi bdag po phrogs nas bdag
T02D1660:397b-11: nyid longs spyod cing dad pa la yang sbyin par
T02D1660:397b-12: byed do // des 'jig rten gyi dngos grub bstan nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub ni /
T02D1660:397b-13: sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun //
T02D1660:397b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:397b-15: bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab nas /
T02D1660:397b-16: phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor ba las mi bya ba gang yang med do //
T02D1660:397b-17: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1660:397b-18: sngags kyang rgyud dang yantra'i thabs gsum gyis phrogs nas
T02D1660:397b-19: gzhan la sbyin par byed na /
T02D1660:397b-20: 'jig rten gyi dngos grub lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02D1660:397b-21: bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab pa'i mthus dngos grub mchog thob pa dang /
T02D1660:397b-23: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dngos grub chen po dang /
T02D1660:397b-24: 'khor los sgyur ba yang rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:397b-25: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sprul pa'i 'khor
T02D1660:397b-26: los sgyur ba bzhugs pa bstan pa ni la lar
T02D1660:397b-27: byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la
T02D1660:397b-29: gdul bya btul ba'i thabs 'grub pa'o //
T02D1660:397b-30: longs sku'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni 'dis /
T02D1660:397b-31: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1660:397b-32: bsam gtan bzhi ba'i lha'i gzugs dang bsam gyis mi khyab par yongs su bsgyur ba sku'i tshe dang /
T02D1660:397b-33: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D1660:397b-34: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i kha dog dang /
T02D1660:397b-35: stobs bcu la sogs pa'i stobs dang /
T02D1660:398a-0: zag med kyi snang ba rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin @398a * //
T02D1660:398a-2: 'gro ba bzang po thams cad kyi bsnyen pa bya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'o //
T02D1660:398a-3: longs sku de yang gcig tu nges pa ci yin snyam na /
T02D1660:398a-4: lha mo bzhi ka'i dbus na rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1660:398a-5: rigs drug 'khor lo'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rgyas 'debs pa dang /
T02D1660:398a-6: 'jig rten gyi lha dang nges par legs pa'i byang
T02D1660:398a-7: chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sems can rnams la sbyin
T02D1660:398a-9: 'khor ba ji srid par gnas kyi bar du bskal
T02D1660:398a-10: ba mang por sems can gyi don du srid pa
T02D1660:398a-12: brtag pa bzhi pa'i 'grel ba rdzogs so /
T02D1660:398a-14: // / de ltar rtog pa thams cad thun mong du sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid bstan pa dang /
T02D1660:398a-17: dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi le'u bshad nas /
T02D1660:398a-18: da ni gdul bya so so'i bye brag gi rtog pa gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:398a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1660:398a-21: 'dod chags chen po'i gang zag 'dul ba'i phyir rdo
T02D1660:398a-22: rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D1660:398a-23: pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam
T02D1660:398a-24: par sbyor ba rdo rje dngos grub rtog pa lha
T02D1660:398a-25: nyi shu rtsa gcig gi mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma
T02D1660:398a-26: bde mchog gis gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:398a-28: sngon 'dzam bu gling du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i skur bshad pa dang /
T02D1660:398a-29: rjes 'jug rnal 'byor ba'i dbang du byas na /
T02D1660:398a-30: gzugs brnyan gyi 'khor lo bsgoms nas /
T02D1660:398a-31: las dang po pa'i dngos grub dang /
T02D1660:398a-32: mchog tu gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ba dngos grub len pa dang /
T02D1660:398a-33: gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i gang zag la dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:398a-34: sngon 'dzam bu gling du byung ba'i sprul sku'i lugs kyi rim pa gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:398a-35: yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid //
T02D1660:398a-37: 'og min du byang chub pas chos kyi sku brnyes pa'o //
T02D1660:398a-38: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar //
T02D1660:398b-0: zhes pa byang chub pa lnga ba @398b la longs sku'i rgyu rdo rje sems dpa' 'am /
T02D1660:398b-5: rgyu'i rta mchog tu snang ba'i rtog pa'i tshogs thams cad la'o //
T02D1660:398b-6: grub pa dam pa mchog gi chos //
T02D1660:398b-7: zhes pas sngon sangs rgyas kyi lam du grub pa
T02D1660:398b-8: zag med dam pa mchog gi lam ni de nyid
T02D1660:398b-10: kha sbyor thig le nas 'byung ba bzhin du zla ba dang /
T02D1660:398b-14: sku gyur pas rtog pa drug po thams cad la
T02D1660:398b-15: 'og min du byang chub pa'i tshe bsgom par bya'o
T02D1660:398b-16: // sna tshogs lam gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1660:398b-17: zhes bya bas 'og min du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bzhugs nas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D1660:398b-21: cho ga sna tshogs pa 'dod pa'i //
T02D1660:398b-22: sems can rnam par gdul ba dang //
T02D1660:398b-23: zhes pa rtog pa drug gi gdul bya 'dod chags chen po dang /
T02D1660:398b-27: ser sna dang le lo chen po can 'dul ba'i phyir /
T02D1660:398b-28: ye shes drug gi bde ba bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02D1660:398b-29: bha ga w'an sngon bde ba can du sprul sku'i 'bras bu ni /
T02D1660:398b-30: rdo rje 'chang drug pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas
T02D1660:398b-31: kyi rnam 'phrul sems can gyi don du sprul nas
T02D1660:398b-32: / phyag rgya bzhi la mos pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:398b-33: de yang thabs gang gis myur ba yin zhe na /
T02D1660:398b-34: byin rlabs kyi lam gyis ye shes sems dpa' bcug pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:398b-35: de ltar sngon byung ba sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bshad nas rjes su 'jug pa gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:398b-36: nyin re'am yang na zla re'am //
T02D1660:398b-37: yang na de bzhin lo re na //
T02D1660:398b-38: ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang //
T02D1660:398b-39: sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o //
T02D1660:398b-41: bsnyen sgrub bzhi bsgoms pas bsnyen pa byas nas zhag gcig 'jog pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'am /
T02D1660:399a-2: ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas zhes pa dkyil 'khor
T02D1660:399a-3: byed pa'i rnal 'byor bas bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa
T02D1660:399a-4: chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i rim pas 'og
T02D1660:399a-5: nas 'byung ba bzhin du bskyed na p'u dza byas
T02D1660:399a-6: la sangs rgyas bde mchog gi zlos gar bsgom par
T02D1660:399a-7: bya'o // yang na ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1660:399a-8: bsgom par mi 'dod na cha lugs byas nas bsgrub
T02D1660:399a-10: khams kyi ngo bo thams cad dang //
T02D1660:399a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1660:399a-12: gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa'o //
T02D1660:399a-13: de bzhin srog dang rtsa las byung //
T02D1660:399a-14: zhes pa srog chags las byung ba'i ba so dang rva las byas pa dang /
T02D1660:399a-15: rtsva las byung ba'i shing la 'bur du brkos nas rang gi lha'i cha lugs su bya'o //
T02D1660:399a-16: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1660:399a-17: sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rang tu zhes pa smos te /
T02D1660:399a-24: dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bstan pa //
T02D1660:399a-25: sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis //
T02D1660:399a-27: rigs drug gi rnal 'byor ba khyim pa'am rab tu
T02D1660:399a-28: byung ba'am skyes pa'am bud med kyi rtog pa drug
T02D1660:399a-29: gi 'khor lo gang dang gang ston pa'o //
T02D1660:399a-30: de yang gang zhig dang lhan cig bsgom zhe na /
T02D1660:399a-31: slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der //
T02D1660:399a-32: mchod pa byas nas de bsgrubs so //
T02D1660:399a-33: zhes bya bas dbang bskur ba'i slob ma'i tshogs dang /
T02D1660:399a-34: gdong rgyan gyon la tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1660:399a-35: de ltar sngon byung dang rjes 'jug gi rgyud bshad nas /
T02D1660:399a-36: da ni rtog pa thams cad kyi sngon byung gi gleng gzhi gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:399a-37: de nas gzhan yang rtog kun gyi //
T02D1660:399a-38: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sprul pa'i rigs drug sprul par bya'o //
T02D1660:399a-39: gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya //
T02D1660:399a-41: de yang ston pa su zhig la gnas gang zhig
T02D1660:399b-0: tu su zhig dang lhan cig tu @399b dus nam
T02D1660:399b-2: ston pa sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02D1660:399b-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba'i mchog / ces bya
T02D1660:399b-4: ba ste longs sku dang sprul sku'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1660:399b-5: do // gnas ni gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na'o //
T02D1660:399b-6: 'khor ni thams cad bdag nyid do //
T02D1660:399b-7: dus ni rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1660:399b-8: der bzhugs pa'i chos sku'i ngo bo ni /
T02D1660:399b-10: rtag pa dam pa brtan pa ste //
T02D1660:399b-11: rtag tu da ltar byung ba bzhin //
T02D1660:399b-12: ngo bo nyid kyis 'da' dka' ba //
T02D1660:399b-15: cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la //
T02D1660:399b-16: las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1660:399b-17: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs //
T02D1660:399b-18: gdul bya'i phyir ni byas pa yin //
T02D1660:399b-19: zhes pa rigs drug gi 'khor lo'i gzugs kyi rnam rtog sprul ba dang /
T02D1660:399b-21: sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g-yo kun //
T02D1660:399b-23: zhes bya bas snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang dang /
T02D1660:399b-24: bcud kyi 'jig rten lhar bskyed pa'o //
T02D1660:399b-25: sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams //
T02D1660:399b-27: ces bya ba phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1660:399b-28: can gyi sems can gyi don du sprul par bshad
T02D1660:399b-29: pa yin no // rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel ba'o /
T02D1660:399b-31: // / de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D1660:399b-32: de ltar sprul sku mi yul du babs pa'i thabs nyams su blang ba'i rim pa bshad nas /
T02D1660:399b-33: da ni yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste /
T02D1660:399b-34: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba'i yan lag gi don dang /
T02D1660:399b-35: brtag pa drug gi nyams su blang ba'i cho ga bshad pa yin no //
T02D1660:399b-36: da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbugs dbyung yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste /
T02D1660:399b-37: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba //
T02D1660:399b-38: zhes bya ba sngon sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku'i mdzad pa bskyed pa dang /
T02D1660:399b-39: spro ba dang bsdu ba dang /
T02D1660:400a-0: @400a * // gnas pa dang brten pa'i tshul lo //
T02D1660:400a-1: bdag nyid chen po rtag pa'o //
T02D1660:400a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las //
T02D1660:400a-4: sngon bcom ldan 'das rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi tshe /
T02D1660:400a-5: bsam gtan bzhi'i yang thog tu /
T02D1660:400a-6: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul gyis sbyor nas dpal mchog
T02D1660:400a-7: la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gsungs pa dang
T02D1660:400a-8: / de bstan pas sems can rnams gzugs sku la
T02D1660:400a-9: sogs par zhen pa sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ba dang
T02D1660:400a-12: 'od srungs la sogs pas dbu ma'i theg pa bstan pas sgro 'dogs bsal bar mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1660:400a-13: de la sems can rmongs pas stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig la zhen pas sgro 'dogs pa dang /
T02D1660:400a-14: skur pa 'debs pa las bzlog pa'i phyir thabs kyi bla na med pa dang /
T02D1660:400a-15: shes rab kyi bla na med pa'i rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:400a-16: de yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i le'u dang po las
T02D1660:400a-17: go rims ji bzhin bshad pas the tshom mi bya'o
T02D1660:400a-18: // shes rab kyis bla na med pa'i mnyam sbyor
T02D1660:400a-19: gyi rgyud stong phrag bco brgyad pa'i dbang du byas
T02D1660:400a-20: nas bdag nyid chen po rtag pa chos kyi sku
T02D1660:400a-21: // las / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las
T02D1660:400a-22: sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi ngor rgyu'i rnam snang gis
T02D1660:400a-26: phrin las mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1660:400a-27: sngon rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi bskal pa dang po la bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yang thog dang /
T02D1660:400a-28: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas dang /
T02D1660:400a-29: ri rab ri'i rtse mor dpal mchog de nyid bsdus
T02D1660:400a-30: pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'dul ba'i don de
T02D1660:400a-31: bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab kyi 'khor lo 'gro ba
T02D1660:400a-32: lha'i gzugs kyi rnam par rtog pa sngon byung ba
T02D1660:400a-33: dang 'dzam bu'i gling du bskal pa bzang po 'di
T02D1660:400a-34: la 'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub dang /
T02D1660:400a-35: 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
T02D1660:400a-36: rab las 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro ba dang mthun
T02D1660:400a-37: par rab byung gi tshul du sngon byung nas sde
T02D1660:400a-38: snod gsungs so // de tshe sems can thams cad
T02D1660:400b-0: shin tu stong @400b pa nyid la sogs pas ye
T02D1660:400b-1: shes rgyun chad 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bar
T02D1660:400b-2: shes pa'i rgyun 'gags nas phung po lhag ma med
T02D1660:400b-3: pas mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T02D1660:400b-4: dor bar bya ba'i rnal 'byor de nyid mkhyen pas /
T02D1660:400b-5: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de bzhin gshegs
T02D1660:400b-6: pa 'gro ba stong pa nyid phyogs gcig la zhen
T02D1660:400b-7: pa de dag stong nyid las 'grol zhing /
T02D1660:400b-8: phung po lhag med kyi mya ngan las 'das pa bzlog pa'i phyir /
T02D1660:400b-9: rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngal skyes kyi dkyil 'khor skyed par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1660:400b-10: bee ro'i dkyil 'khor des lta ba lhag na ci zhig ston snyam na /
T02D1660:400b-11: stong pa'ang ma yin mi stong pa'ang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:400b-12: don dam par sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02D1660:400b-13: rab tu mi gnas pa lta bu'i stong pa yang ma yin zhing /
T02D1660:400b-14: rnam bcas dang rnam med lta bu'i mi stong pa yang ma yin la /
T02D1660:400b-15: gnyis su med pa'i zung du 'jug pa dbu mar yang mi dmigs pas /
T02D1660:400b-16: shes rab stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1660:400b-17: thabs snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi chos sku rtog med
T02D1660:400b-18: las dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes su yongs
T02D1660:400b-19: su brtags pa'o // rnam par mi rtog pa la
T02D1660:400b-20: mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa la mos pa yang lha'i
T02D1660:400b-21: 'khor lo thams cad brag ca'am sgra brnyan gyi tshul
T02D1660:400b-23: 'gro ba rmongs pa lha'i sku la zhen pas sgro
T02D1660:400b-24: 'dogs dang skur 'debs mi bya'o zhes pa'i dgongs pa
T02D1660:400b-25: bstan pa'i phyir / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang lha'i de nyid gsungs pa yin la /
T02D1660:400b-26: ma 'ongs pa'i sgo gsum sngags kyi sgo / nas
T02D1660:400b-27: spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor
T02D1660:400b-29: theg pa chen po yon tan rgyas pa'i glus dus
T02D1660:400b-30: gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod
T02D1660:400b-31: par bya'o // de yang mnyam nyid mi g-yo ba //
T02D1660:400b-33: mchog chos can zhes pa'i bar gyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang /
T02D1660:401a-1: shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang zhes pa nas /
T02D1660:401a-2: nges par gsol gyi par gyis mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang /
T02D1660:401a-3: rtag tu dri med thugs zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1660:401a-4: rtag tu rnam par zhes bya ba'i bar gyis so
T02D1660:401a-5: sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa
T02D1660:401a-6: dang / tshad med tshad dang bral ba zhes bya
T02D1660:401a-7: ba nas yong mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyis
T02D1660:401a-8: bya ba na na tan gyi ye shes kyi sgo
T02D1660:401a-10: ae ma'o shin tu bzang po zhes pa nas bdag
T02D1660:401a-11: la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis chos kyi
T02D1660:401a-12: dbyings kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang
T02D1660:401a-13: / slob dpon klu sgrub ni bsnyen pa'i dus su
T02D1660:401a-14: phra mo'i sa m'a dhi la snyoms par zhugs pa
T02D1660:401a-15: / na / lha mo rnams kyi glus bskul bar bzhed do //
T02D1660:401a-16: aindra bh'u ti rgyu'i rnam snang zhu ba las 'bras
T02D1660:401a-17: bu'i bee ro bskyed pa'i phyir lha mo bzhi'i glus
T02D1660:401a-18: bskul bar bzhed / rab zhi bshes gnyen dang /
T02D1660:401a-19: kun dga' snying po ni dkyil 'khor sgom pa rdzogs
T02D1660:401a-20: nas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin las bslang
T02D1660:401a-22: ye shes zhabs ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog la bstod par the tshom mi za'o //
T02D1660:401a-23: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1660:401a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1660:401a-25: de nas de yi sgrub pa dang //
T02D1660:401a-26: zhes bya bas rjes 'jug gi don bshad pa yin te /
T02D1660:401a-27: sgrub pa ni mtshan ma thob kyi bar du bsnyen sgrub gnyis lha'i 'khor lo bsgom pa'o //
T02D1660:401a-28: shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub pa dang /
T02D1660:401a-29: ces pa mtshan ma thob nas /
T02D1660:401a-30: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa'o //
T02D1660:401a-31: gang gi srid pa 'di nyid la //
T02D1660:401a-32: dngos grub shin tu rtag pa 'thob //
T02D1660:401a-34: mchog gi dngos grub tuddha bo dhi'i ye shes grub pa'o //
T02D1660:401a-35: de sgrub pa'i thabs gang yin zhe na /
T02D1660:401a-36: rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis //
T02D1660:401a-37: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
T02D1660:401a-39: bee ro'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa'i rnal
T02D1660:401a-40: 'byor pa byin gyi rlabs kyis lam ye shes sems
T02D1660:401a-41: dpa' gzhug pa'o // thal mo legs par sbyar ba yis //
T02D1660:401a-42: thal mo lan gsum nges par brdab //
T02D1660:401a-43: ces pa ye shes sems dpa' byon pa la phyag
T02D1660:401a-44: byas nas snying gar bcug ste dbang bskur ba'i mthar
T02D1660:401b-1: dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur //
T02D1660:401b-2: de dang de yi ngo bor bya //
T02D1660:401b-3: zhes pa buddha'i dbang po dang rang gi mnyam par sbyor bar ro gcig par bsgom pa'o //
T02D1660:401b-4: ji ltar mos pa chags pa dang //
T02D1660:401b-5: zhes pa lha la dang ba'i dad par mos par
T02D1660:401b-6: bsgoms na sha dza ba zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1660:401b-8: sngags kyi glu len cing bstod par bya'o //
T02D1660:401b-11: thams cad ni rnam pa'i bye brag go / bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun //
T02D1660:401b-13: sangs rgyas kun dang dngos grub 'dzin //
T02D1660:401b-14: rab tu mthong zhing dngos grub po //
T02D1660:401b-15: zhes bya ba rang gi lus dang lha tha mi dad mthong ba dang reg pa dang /
T02D1660:401b-16: thos pa'i mtshan ma thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:401b-17: gang gi tshe dngos grub ma thob na bskyar chos
T02D1660:401b-18: gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes bya ba
T02D1660:401b-20: sngar bshad pa'i bstod pa'i rgyal pos rigs kyi rnal
T02D1660:401b-21: 'byor pas mtshan thog thag lha la bstod na de
T02D1660:401b-22: kho na nyid bskul ba yin pa dngos grub grub
T02D1660:401b-24: bee ro'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o //
T02D1660:401b-25: de ltar bee ro'i dbugs dbyung ba bshad nas /
T02D1660:401b-26: he ru ka yi dbugs dbyung ni //
T02D1660:401b-27: 'das pa'i dus nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:401b-28: 'das pa'i dus nas zhes bya ba la sogs bshad zin to //
T02D1660:401b-29: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02D1660:401b-30: zhes bya ba 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i rjes la
T02D1660:401b-31: sems can thams cad gdug cing gtum par 'gyur ro
T02D1660:401b-32: // gdug par 'gyur du zad mod nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1660:401b-33: shin tu khro zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1660:401b-34: de'i rnam smin gyis du 'bod du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:401b-35: de nas tshe 'phos nas 'byung bo gtogs 'dod can
T02D1660:401b-36: gyi bu 'byung po dge ba can du skye bar
T02D1660:401b-37: 'gyur ro // de legs ldan byed nag por gyur nas /
T02D1660:401b-38: des grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig pa'i phyir /
T02D1660:401b-39: rims dug dbyig dug la sogs pa log 'dren gyi las byed pa dang /
T02D1660:401b-40: 'jig rten gsum po 'jig par byed cing rig pa
T02D1660:401b-41: 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa po rnams la 'tshe ba dang
T02D1660:401b-42: / lha la sogs pa tshe 'pho bar byed pa dang /
T02D1660:401b-43: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang 'jig par byed do //
T02D1660:402a-0: de'i tshe drag po 'jigs byed kyis gdug pa de ma bzod nas dbang po dang @402a * //
T02D1660:402a-1: bcas pa'i lha tshangs pa la skyabs su song po //
T02D1660:402a-2: tshangs pa yang khyab 'jug la skyabs su song ngo //
T02D1660:402a-3: khyab 'jug kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu chen po la skyabs su song ngo //
T02D1660:402a-4: lha chen po des bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'cham
T02D1660:402a-5: ba'i rang bzhin shes nas de nyid la skyabs su
T02D1660:402a-6: song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D1660:402a-7: 'chang ba de nyid kyis rdo rje se gol brda
T02D1660:402a-8: bas nas rdo rje bsdu ba mdzad de /
T02D1660:402a-9: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs nas 'jig rten gyi
T02D1660:402a-10: khams thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin gang bar
T02D1660:402a-11: gyur to // rdo rje sems dpas gdug cing gtum
T02D1660:402a-12: pa'i sems can la zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur
T02D1660:402a-13: gyur to // bar gzigs nas / shes rab thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02D1660:402a-14: thabs shes rab kyi snying po h'um gsungs pas bdag
T02D1660:402a-15: nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khros nas khro
T02D1660:402a-16: bo'i gzugs su mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1660:402a-18: khro bo'i ched du brjod pa ni /
T02D1660:402a-19: khro bo'i tshul can khros pas ni //
T02D1660:402a-20: 'jig rten gsum yang sreg byed na //
T02D1660:402a-21: sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis //
T02D1660:402a-22: khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos //
T02D1660:402a-23: de nas sna yi rtse mo la //
T02D1660:402a-24: yid ni yang dag brtan par gzung //
T02D1660:402a-25: zhes pa dpal he ru ka yab yum thabs shes
T02D1660:402a-26: rab gnyis su med pa'i yab yum gyi mkha' gsang
T02D1660:402a-27: du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhu ba'i thig le yi
T02D1660:402a-28: ge h'um gyi gzugs su snang ba la sems bzung
T02D1660:402a-29: nas / gsang ba'i rdo rje sna rtse'i dbugs yi
T02D1660:402a-30: ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis ring zhing dro bar
T02D1660:402a-31: gyur pa las he ru ka'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya
T02D1660:402a-32: goo r'i ma la sogs pa mngal skyes kyis byung
T02D1660:402a-34: de nyid ma 'ongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod
T02D1660:402a-35: pa spyad par 'dod pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1660:402a-36: 'khor lo mngal skyes kyi rim pa bsgom par bya'o
T02D1660:402a-38: bcom ldan 'das de nyid rnal 'byor pa zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1660:402a-39: bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i mdog ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T02D1660:402a-40: sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:402a-41: zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa /
T02D1660:402a-45: rgyab ma rmongs par mdzad pa ser po //
T02D1660:402a-46: phyag dang po gnyis na rdo rje dang dril bu //
T02D1660:402b-0: 'og ma @402b gnyis na 'jigs byed kyi pags pa bsnams pa /
T02D1660:402b-1: gsum pa gnyis na mda' dang gzhu /
T02D1660:402b-2: bzhi pa gnyis na mdung dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1660:402b-3: yang na zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o //
T02D1660:402b-4: des phrin las ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02D1660:402b-5: 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag / ces pa nas /
T02D1660:402b-6: thams cad pha ma nas slang yang ni //
T02D1660:402b-7: thal bar gyur pa 'tsho bar byed pa'i phar gsungs te /
T02D1660:402b-8: ma rungs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad la sdug bsngal
T02D1660:402b-9: phab nas slar yang shi bas thal bar gyur pa
T02D1660:402b-10: las slar 'tsho bar mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1660:402b-11: slar yang ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02D1660:402b-14: rang gi nyi ma'i 'od zer 'bar ba las byung ba'i dur khrod kyi zhing skyong du sprul nas /
T02D1660:402b-15: grib ma bzhin du sprul pa'i gzugs su mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1660:402b-16: de nas ma lus pa'i bdud las grags pa /
T02D1660:402b-17: ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i bar du gcod pa'i
T02D1660:402b-18: gdug pa la sogs pa'i khrag za bar nus pa
T02D1660:402b-19: dur khrod kyi rgyal po he ru ka dang lhan
T02D1660:402b-21: de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyangs nas 'gro ba thams cad byang chub la bkod de /
T02D1660:402b-22: sems can gyi khams thams cad sbyangs pa yin no //
T02D1660:402b-23: he ru ka'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1660:402b-25: // / de ltar he ru ka'i dbugs dbyung bshad nas /
T02D1660:402b-26: da ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dbugs dbyung bshad par bya ste /
T02D1660:402b-27: 'das pa'i dus nas sngon byung ba //
T02D1660:402b-28: zhes pa nas 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba'i bar du bshad zin to //
T02D1660:402b-29: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02D1660:402b-30: zhes pa sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i rjes
T02D1660:402b-31: la sems can thams cad rmongs pa'i dbang gis log
T02D1660:402b-32: par lta ba can du gyur to //
T02D1660:402b-33: de nas chags pa'i dbang gis du 'bod chen por skyes par gyur to //
T02D1660:402b-34: log lta can gyi shes rab de nyid sbyang ba'i phyir /
T02D1660:402b-35: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis ji ltar padma
T02D1660:402b-36: dmar po 'di 'dam las skyes kyang 'dam gyi nyes
T02D1660:402b-37: pas mi gos pa bzhin te /
T02D1660:402b-38: khams gsum pa'i sems can 'od gsal glo bur gyi
T02D1660:402b-39: dri ma'i nyes pas ma gos pa gzigs nas spyan
T02D1660:402b-40: ras gzigs kyi skur bskyed pa yin //
T02D1660:402b-41: de yang su zhig yin zhe na /
T02D1660:402b-42: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1660:403a-1: drug gi dkyil 'khor dang rdo rje sems dpa' nyid rtsa ba'i sprul sku yin zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D1660:403a-2: de bas na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1660:403a-3: des log lta las byung ba'i 'dod chags 'dul ba'i
T02D1660:403a-4: phyir / so sor rtog pa 'dod chags dag pa'i mchod sbyin te /
T02D1660:403a-5: padma gar gyi dbang phyug thabs dang shes rab mnyam
T02D1660:403a-6: par sbyor ba'i mngal skyes kyi rim pas padma gar
T02D1660:403a-7: gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis sna
T02D1660:403a-8: tshogs pa 'dul ba la kun du spyan ras gzigs
T02D1660:403a-9: dbang phyug gi rgyal po snang ba mtha' yas su
T02D1660:403a-11: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1660:403a-13: // / de ltar gar gyi dbang phyug gi 'grel pa bshad nas /
T02D1660:403a-14: da ni rdo rje nyi ma'i dbugs dbyung ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D1660:403a-15: 'das pa'i dus nas sngon byung ba'i tshigs bcad gcig bshad zin to //
T02D1660:403a-16: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02D1660:403a-17: zhes bya ba ni buddha 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i
T02D1660:403a-18: rjes la ser sna'i sems kyis 'dug cing nor la
T02D1660:403a-19: shas cher bsgom par gyur pa dang /
T02D1660:403a-20: shin tu 'jungs par gyur pa'i dbang gis yi dags kyi gnas su lhung bar gyur to //
T02D1660:403a-21: de nas tshe 'phos nas mi dbul bor skyes nas bkres pa dang skom pa dang /
T02D1660:403a-22: phan tshun gsod par gyur pa dang /
T02D1660:403a-23: shin tu gdug pa'i ser sna can gyi rnal 'byor de nyid sbyang ba'i phyir /
T02D1660:403a-24: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas mnyam pa nyid
T02D1660:403a-25: kyi nor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
T02D1660:403a-26: bzhag nas rdo rje nyi ma'i gzugs su mdzad pa
T02D1660:403a-27: yin no // de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i
T02D1660:403a-28: snying po rdo rje nyi ma des phyogs bcu'i sems
T02D1660:403a-29: can thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par bya ba'i
T02D1660:403a-30: phyir bud med rin po che la sogs pa'i char
T02D1660:403a-31: yin no // phab bas / sems can thams cad
T02D1660:403a-32: la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid ster ba yin
T02D1660:403a-33: yin no // phab bas / no // gang gi
T02D1660:403a-34: phyir gdug cing ser sna can gyi nga rgyal gyis
T02D1660:403a-35: khro ba la zhi bas phan phar mi 'gyur ba
T02D1660:403a-36: yin no // phab bas / no // de'i phyir
T02D1660:403a-37: / shes rab thabs kyi rdo rje nyi ma las
T02D1660:403a-38: yin no // phab bas / no // de'i phyir
T02D1660:403a-39: / / mngal skyes kyi rim pas nyi ma'i 'od
