T02D1660:403a-42: zhes bya ba lus ngag sems kyi dbang du bya
T02D1660:403a-43: yin no // phab bas / no // de'i phyir
T02D1660:403b-0: / / ba'o // zlog pa dang zhes @403b bya
T02D1660:403b-1: ba srog dang rnam shes thim pa'o //
T02D1660:403b-2: dbrog pas kyang ni khyad par du //
T02D1660:403b-3: zhes pa btsun mo la longs spyad pa dang /
T02D1660:403b-4: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la longs spyad pa'o //
T02D1660:403b-5: de ltar gzhan las rgyal bar byas te /
T02D1660:403b-6: sa 'og sa bla sa stengs kyi gnas gsum po
T02D1660:403b-7: mtha' dag gi rang dbang yod pa'i nor gyi tshogs
T02D1660:403b-8: thams cad kun du sdud par byed cing 'jig rten
T02D1660:403b-9: gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yin no //
T02D1660:403b-10: rdo rje nyi ma'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1660:403b-12: // / da ni rta mchog gi dbugs dbyung ba bshad de /
T02D1660:403b-13: 'das pa'i dus na zhes pa'i shloka ni bshad zin to //
T02D1660:403b-14: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02D1660:403b-15: zhes pa 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i rjes la'o //
T02D1660:403b-16: brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar gyur pa shes pa /
T02D1660:403b-17: le lo dang phrag dog dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1660:403b-18: le lo des cir 'gyur snyam na /
T02D1660:403b-19: mnar med pa yi dmyal bar lhung //
T02D1660:403b-21: mnar med pa ni nye bar mtshon pa ste brgyad do //
T02D1660:403b-22: de nas shi 'phos te mir skyes kyang byi po dang /
T02D1660:403b-24: rkun bos dge ba'i phyogs la bar du gcod pa'i las byed pa yin no //
T02D1660:403b-25: rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D1660:403b-26: dpas mkhyen nas bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes
T02D1660:403b-27: kyi rang bzhin drag shul gyi sbyor ba'i tshul rta
T02D1660:403b-28: mchog gi tshul du skyed par byed pa yin no
T02D1660:403b-29: // gdul bya sems can thams cad dag par mos
T02D1660:403b-30: pas sdig pa med pa'i thugs rje'i stobs kyis mngon
T02D1660:403b-32: pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis //
T02D1660:403b-33: zhes pa dbang bya ba dang longs spyad pa thim pa'i mdzad pas zil gyis non par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1660:403b-34: ji ltar zil gyis non snyam na rta mchog yab
T02D1660:403b-35: yum mnyam par sbyor ba mngal skyes kyi rim pas
T02D1660:403b-36: shin tu le los gdug cing phrag dog gis gtum
T02D1660:403b-37: pa'i sems can rnam pa mang po'i 'jig rten thams
T02D1660:403b-38: cad 'jig par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1660:403b-40: des ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02D1660:403b-41: byi bo chom po rkun po yis //
T02D1660:403b-43: byi bo ni gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro ba'o //
T02D1660:403b-44: rkun po ni ma mthong bar nor 'phrog pa'o //
T02D1660:403b-45: chom po ni mngon sum du nor 'phrog pa'o //
T02D1660:403b-46: brid pa dang ni sgyu dag dang //
T02D1660:404a-2: sgyu ni rang gi nyes pa 'chab pa'i thabs sems gya gyu ba'o //
T02D1660:404a-3: thams cad rnam par sbyor bar byed //
T02D1660:404a-5: gdul bya de dag sprul pa'i 'khor los sbyor ba'o //
T02D1660:404a-6: ngo mthon stobs kyis de bzhin du //
T02D1660:404a-7: zhes pa mngon sum du brtson 'grus kyi sto pas
T02D1660:404a-8: kyis dbang du bya ba longs spyod pa thim pa'o
T02D1660:404a-9: // dgra cha lnga yis brgal nas ni //
T02D1660:404a-11: rdo rje ral gri mda' gzhu mdung rtse gcig pa be con gyis btul nas /
T02D1660:404a-12: de'i tshe 'jig rten kun las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:404a-13: de nas dbus kyi gtso bo rta mchog gi dbang
T02D1660:404a-14: du byas nas gdul bya rnams 'dul ba'i thabs sna
T02D1660:404a-15: tshogs kyis rang gi rgyal srid skyong ba zhes gsungs
T02D1660:404a-16: pa yin no // khams kyi rta mchog gnyis kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D1660:404a-17: g-yem pa rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1660:404a-18: g-yem pa'i dbang gis sku dang khro bo rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1660:404a-19: khro ba mngon spyod kyi sku dang /
T02D1660:404a-20: zhi ba 'dul ba'i phyir zhi ba'i sku dang /
T02D1660:404a-21: drag shul can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir drag po rgyas pa'i sku bstan pa yin no //
T02D1660:404a-22: rta mchog de bzhir gang btul ba yin zhe na /
T02D1660:404a-23: sdig pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis mngon
T02D1660:404a-24: sum du mnan nas lha mo byi ma 'phrogs pa
T02D1660:404a-25: yin no // mthu'i tshe khyab 'jug mnan nas lha
T02D1660:404a-26: mo drug ma ni 'phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin
T02D1660:404a-27: yin no // no // skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs
T02D1660:404a-28: pa mnan nas lha mo rab tu zhi ba 'phrogs
T02D1660:404a-29: nas longs spyod pa yin no //
T02D1660:404a-30: 'dod pa'i lha mnan nas mi'i dbang phyug ma 'phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin no //
T02D1660:404a-31: de ltar sngon byung gi dus sum rungs pa thams
T02D1660:404a-32: cad mnan nas lus ngag sems dbang du byas te
T02D1660:404a-33: / lha mo dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo thams cad 'phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin no //
T02D1660:404a-34: de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa 'gags nas srog thim pa dang /
T02D1660:404a-35: mi rtog pa'i ye shes skyes nas ye shes thim pas na /
T02D1660:404a-36: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa nas /
T02D1660:404a-37: rdo rje las chen rnam ston pa //
T02D1660:404a-38: zhes pa'i bar du sprul pa'i skus sems can gyi don bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:404a-39: sems can de dag 'dul bar mdzad pa ni gang /
T02D1660:404a-40: thabs ni gang gis thob par 'gyur //
T02D1660:404a-41: 'bras bu ni gang thob snyam na /
T02D1660:404b-0: nam mkha' @404b kun gyi skabs na dpal //
T02D1660:404b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas //
T02D1660:404b-3: thabs dang rtsal gyis sgrub pa yis //
T02D1660:404b-4: zhes pa dbang du bya ba'i thabs dang longs spyod
T02D1660:404b-5: pa'i rtsal gyis mngon spyod kyi sbyor ba'i stobs kyis
T02D1660:404b-6: bsgrubs pas khams gsum pa'i rgyal srid ma lus pa
T02D1660:404b-7: la dbang ba rta mchog gi gzugs su rdo rje
T02D1660:404b-8: 'dzin pa de yis thob par mdzad nas mngal skyes
T02D1660:404b-9: kyi rim pas rigs bsdus pa'i 'khor bzhis bskor ba'o
T02D1660:404b-10: // byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mchog sprul nas
T02D1660:404b-11: mngon spyod kyi drag shul gyi sbyor bas sgrub par
T02D1660:404b-12: mdzad pa ni thabs yin no //
T02D1660:404b-14: thams cad rnam dag mos pa'i sa //
T02D1660:404b-16: sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel //
T02D1660:404b-17: zhes pa'i bar gyis mchog gi dngos grub dang /
T02D1660:404b-18: lha yi dngos grub dga' ba dang //
T02D1660:404b-19: zhes pa nas 'jig rten gyi siddhi grub pa'o //
T02D1660:404b-20: sangs rgyas byang chub bde ba che //
T02D1660:404b-22: rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas /
T02D1660:404b-23: shes pa'i bar gyis chos kyi sku bstan /
T02D1660:404b-24: sems can thams cad dri ma dag / ces pa nas /
T02D1660:404b-25: sems can khams la bstan par sbyin //
T02D1660:404b-26: zhes pa'i bar gyis longs sku bstan pa dang /
T02D1660:404b-27: rta mchog rnam par sprul pa yin //
T02D1660:404b-28: zhes pa nas sems can gyi don yang byed ces bya ba'i bar gyis sprul sku bstan to //
T02D1660:404b-29: rta mchog gi dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1660:404b-31: // / de ltar dbugs dbyung drug bshad nas /
T02D1660:404b-32: de rnams kyi mjug bsdu ba ni //
T02D1660:404b-33: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:404b-34: dbang bskur ba'i 'khor lo ni rnam pa drug yin la /
T02D1660:404b-35: dngos grub len pa'i 'khor lo ni lha brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
T02D1660:404b-36: yang na dpa' bo gcig pu'i brgya rtsa brgyad sprul nas /
T02D1660:404b-37: sngon byung gdul bya btul ba rnams rang byung gi
T02D1660:404b-38: gtam dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes rtogs pa
T02D1660:404b-39: yin no // dkyil 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad po de
T02D1660:404b-40: rnams dang po sbyor ba'i rtsa ba'i lha gang gis
T02D1660:404b-41: yin no // sprul zhe na / nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal //
T02D1660:404b-42: rdo rje sems dpa' kun du gnas //
T02D1660:404b-44: dngos grub len pa'i rnal 'byor ba brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D1660:404b-45: kyang grub pa'i dbang phyug rab tu grub pa ste
T02D1660:405a-0: / 'jig rten thun mong dang mchog gi @405a * //
T02D1660:405a-2: thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed //
T02D1660:405a-3: ces pa dngos grub thob pa'i rnal 'byor ba phrin las thams cad la 'jug par byed do //
T02D1660:405a-4: gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes pa bskal pa dang po dpal mchog gi lo rgyus dang /
T02D1660:405a-5: bar gyi bskal ba sangs rgyas gsum gyi lo rgyus dang /
T02D1660:405a-6: bskal ba tha mar mnyam sbyor gyi dbugs dbyung dkyil 'khor drug gi brtag pa sprul pa dang /
T02D1660:405a-7: ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa drug gi rjes 'jug bsgom pa gsungs pa'o //
T02D1660:405a-10: // / de ltar sngon byung dang rjes 'jug gi dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor drug bshad nas /
T02D1660:405a-11: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba'i tshogs skal ba dang ldan par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1660:405a-12: de nas gzhan yang thams cad du //
T02D1660:405a-13: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:405a-14: gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang
T02D1660:405a-15: bskur ba med na dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur
T02D1660:405a-16: ba de'i phyir // mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog bshad //
T02D1660:405a-17: ces bya bar sbyor ba gzhan yang zhes bya ba
T02D1660:405a-18: dkyil 'khor snga ma drug la ltos nas skal pa
T02D1660:405a-19: dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams smin par bya ba
T02D1660:405a-21: thams cad du zhes pa phyogs thams cad du skal
T02D1660:405a-22: ba dang ldan pa'i gang zag rtog pa drug pa
T02D1660:405a-24: rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gyur pa ni rigs drug
T02D1660:405a-25: gi 'khor lo bshad pas gdul bya rnams btul ba'o
T02D1660:405a-26: // de thabs gang gis yin snyam na /
T02D1660:405a-27: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1660:405a-28: mkha' 'gro sgyur ma bde ba'i mchog / ces smos te /
T02D1660:405a-29: rigs drug gi sangs rgyas zag pa med pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D1660:405a-30: so so'i skye bo'i rnal 'byor pa glo bur gyi
T02D1660:405a-31: dri ma dang bcas pa rnams mnyam par sbyar bas
T02D1660:405a-32: zhig nas dang lhag mthong gi mkha' 'gro ma'i sgyu
T02D1660:405a-33: ma'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa ste /
T02D1660:405a-34: de yang zhi gnas bde ba dang /
T02D1660:405a-35: lhag mthong stong pa nyid rgyu rkyen tshogs pas bde mchog ste /
T02D1660:405a-36: zag med kyi bde ba sgyu ma'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa bshad par bya'o //
T02D1660:405a-37: bde mchog de gnas gang du sgrub //
T02D1660:405a-38: dngos po gang zhig / sgrub thabs ji lta bu
T02D1660:405a-39: zhig gis sgrub snyam na dpal ldan zhes bya ba
T02D1660:405a-41: de'i gnas ni phyi dang nang gcig yin la /
T02D1660:405b-0: phyi'i @405b gnas yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa'am /
T02D1660:405b-2: bha ga dang chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gsum la yin no //
T02D1660:405b-3: phyi rol gyi gnas yid du 'ong bar rdul tshon
T02D1660:405b-4: gyi dkyil 'khor bres nas bum pa'i dbang bskur ba
T02D1660:405b-5: ni brtag pa bdun pa las ston par 'gyur ro
T02D1660:405b-6: // 'dir ni mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i
T02D1660:405b-7: dbang du mdzad nas lus kyi dkyil 'khor la gsang
T02D1660:405b-9: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1660:405b-10: chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bzhi pa bskur ba gsum bshad pa bya'o //
T02D1660:405b-11: de la lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang bha ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bshed nas /
T02D1660:405b-12: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02D1660:405b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' bde byung ba //
T02D1660:405b-14: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pas na //
T02D1660:405b-15: zhes pas gnas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:405b-16: zhi gnas bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang /
T02D1660:405b-17: lhag mthong zag med kyi bde ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1660:405b-18: bde ba de 'byung ba'i gnas ni lus kyi dkyil
T02D1660:405b-19: 'khor bha ga'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba mchog gi dgyes
T02D1660:405b-20: pa na'o // sarbba bdag nyid ni 'khor phun sum
T02D1660:405b-21: tshogs pa'i yon tan dang lan pa'i bdag nyid rlung
T02D1660:405b-22: gnyis 'gog pa'i dus su dga' ba bzhi'i dus na
T02D1660:405b-24: de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang
T02D1660:405b-25: du byas nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes
T02D1660:405b-26: kyi rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings gsang ba
T02D1660:405b-27: mchog gi dgyes pa ni ye shes lnga thams cad
T02D1660:405b-28: kyi bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus rtag
T02D1660:405b-29: tu bzhugs so zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1660:405b-30: bsgrub pa'i dngos po gang zhe na sangs rgyas thams
T02D1660:405b-31: cad kyi 'da' bar mi bya ba ni dpal stong
T02D1660:405b-32: pa nyid dang sgyu ma lta bu ro gcig pa'i
T02D1660:405b-33: rdo rje sems dpa' der snang ba'i bde ba'i ngo
T02D1660:405b-34: bo'o // thams cad kyi khyad par ni de bzhin
T02D1660:405b-35: gshegs pa rin po che bzhi'i dpung rgyan do shal
T02D1660:405b-36: la sogs pas brgyan zhing spras pa'o //
T02D1660:405b-38: dri sbyangs me tog spos kyis brgyan //
T02D1660:405b-39: shing tu sgra snyan dril bu dkrol //
T02D1660:405b-41: rdo rje dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa //
T02D1660:406a-0: @406a * // zhes pa ni dmangs rigs kyi bu mo lo bcu
T02D1660:406a-1: drug lon pa'i dpyid kyi dus kyi re ta dang
T02D1660:406a-2: ldan pa'o // bla re dam pa bres pa na //
T02D1660:406a-3: zhes pa gos sar pa bgos pa'o //
T02D1660:406a-4: rdo rje tshig dang mchod pa la sogs so //
T02D1660:406a-5: zhes pa brda dang 'khyud pa dang /
T02D1660:406a-6: 'o byed pa la sogs pa ka ra na'i mchod pas mchod pa'o //
T02D1660:406a-7: glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul //
T02D1660:406a-8: zhes pa glu bzhi len cing gling bu dang pi
T02D1660:406a-9: wang la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad bcus bskor
T02D1660:406a-10: ba'i gnas so // yang na sgra ji bzhin bshad pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1660:406a-11: me tog bdug pa mar me dri lha bshos la
T02D1660:406a-12: sogs pas brgyan zhing gnas su lus dang bha ga'i
T02D1660:406a-13: dkyil 'khor la sgyu ma'i bde mchog bsgrub par bya'o
T02D1660:406a-14: // yang na bde ba'i gnas skyed mos tshal la
T02D1660:406a-15: sogs par rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang
T02D1660:406a-16: du byas nas gdan nyi shu rtsa gcig pa bshams
T02D1660:406a-17: // te / nang tshangs dang bcas pa'i 'jam pa
T02D1660:406a-18: reg na bde ba'i stan tshogs padmas brgyan pa'i ras
T02D1660:406a-19: kyis g-yogs la de thams cad kyi gdan la bsnyen
T02D1660:406a-20: sgrub bzhi'i rim pa dang po rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1660:406a-21: bskyed la phyis rten de thams cad las 'khor gyi
T02D1660:406a-23: de yang dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma nyi shu
T02D1660:406a-24: tham pa mngal skyes kyi rim pas so sor rang
T02D1660:406a-25: gi lha sgom du gzhug go //
T02D1660:406a-26: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gzhal yas khang du ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
T02D1660:406a-27: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1660:406a-29: sgo srung dang ni ldan par bya //
T02D1660:406a-30: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02D1660:406a-31: de rnams kha dog dang dbyibs ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1660:406a-32: rang gi lha dang 'dra ba'i zhes gsungs te /
T02D1660:406a-33: bud med rnams ni legs pa zhes pa bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs nas /
T02D1660:406a-34: rang rang gi lha mo bsgom pa'am /
T02D1660:406a-35: gdong rgyan dang do shal dang bcas pas rang gi
T02D1660:406a-36: mu dras mtshan ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo brtag par
T02D1660:406a-37: bya'o // tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i rdzas ni /
T02D1660:406a-38: mi yi mtshal ni grub pa la //
T02D1660:406a-39: dmar chen zhes bya bar bshad ces gsungs te /
T02D1660:406a-42: ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang //
T02D1660:406a-43: rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o //
T02D1660:406b-0: gtso @406b bo rtsa ba dang tshe 'phel bar byed pa ka ma ta tva dang /
T02D1660:406b-1: be sh'an ta tva zhes bya ba ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dang /
T02D1660:406b-2: de'i rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i dga' ba
T02D1660:406b-3: bzhi rtog pa med pa ni ni ranydza tattva zhes
T02D1660:406b-4: pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa yin no //
T02D1660:406b-5: de ji ltar myang snyam na /
T02D1660:406b-6: rdo rje chu dang rdo rjer bcas //
T02D1660:406b-8: dri chen dri chu bcas pas /
T02D1660:406b-9: byang chub sems dpa' dang mtshal chen po ste sha
T02D1660:406b-10: dang bcas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga rang bzhin gyi mthus
T02D1660:406b-11: nus pa dang ldan pa thod pa'i snod du bzhag
T02D1660:406b-12: nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig
T02D1660:406b-13: ro rdo rje ma la sgyu ma lta bur rtogs
T02D1660:406b-14: pa yin no // de ni gang zag gcig gis ma yin par //
T02D1660:406b-15: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis myang bar bya'o //
T02D1660:406b-16: zhi ba'i btung ba bstan pa ni //
T02D1660:406b-17: de yi mtshal dang khu ba dang //
T02D1660:406b-19: mtshal ni rang byung gi me tog go //
T02D1660:406b-20: khu ba ni sa bon no //
T02D1660:406b-21: mtshal chen po sgrub pa ni bdud rtsi sgrub pa'o//
T02D1660:406b-23: bdud rtsi lnga la mtshal chen po //
T02D1660:406b-24: zhes khyad par gyi ming gang gis gdags she na /
T02D1660:406b-25: bde ba stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i chags pa chen
T02D1660:406b-26: po las byung bas na dmar chen zhes bshad do
T02D1660:406b-28: tsandan dmar po ste sha chen bcas pa tshogs kyi
T02D1660:406b-29: dbus su bzhag pas lha thams cad kyis myong ba'i
T02D1660:406b-30: ra sa ya na shi ba slong pa zhes bya
T02D1660:406b-31: bar 'gyur ro // ji ltar myong zhe na /
T02D1660:406b-32: rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pa //
T02D1660:406b-34: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rang
T02D1660:406b-35: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas srin lag
T02D1660:406b-36: dang / mthe bo'i rtse mos zhi ba'i btung ba
T02D1660:406b-37: bzhin myangs na rtag par zag med kyi ye shes
T02D1660:406b-38: kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:406b-39: de yang rdo rje gdan bzhi las /
T02D1660:406b-40: mthe bos gzhir bskyed nas srin lag ri rab tu bsams te /
T02D1660:406b-41: bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen por bsgoms dkrugs te sprul pa /
T02D1660:406b-42: ri bo ba di ra las btus pa'i rtsva so
T02D1660:406b-43: ma ni zhes pa gi wang yod pa'i ba ser
T02D1660:406b-44: mo'i ko bar rig byed kyi sngags zlos shing brdungs
T02D1660:406b-45: nas 'thungs pas sdig pa dag par 'dod pa de
T02D1660:406b-46: bzhin du myang bar bya zhes gsungs so //
T02D1660:406b-48: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te //
T02D1660:407a-0: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te go @407a * //
T02D1660:407a-2: / de ltar gsang ba'i dbang bshad nas /
T02D1660:407a-3: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:407a-4: de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus //
T02D1660:407a-6: khrus byas shing lus dri zhim pos byugs la ci 'byor ba'i gos dang rgyan btags te /
T02D1660:407a-7: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing kha dri zhim
T02D1660:407a-8: pos bkang la rigs sna tshogs pa'i bud med skal
T02D1660:407a-9: ba bzang po dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1660:407a-10: aa wa dh'u t'i'i sgo sbyar nas reg bya'i bde
T02D1660:407a-11: ba la stong pa nyid kyi ye shes pa skyes
T02D1660:407a-12: nas / sngon po gnyid log pa'i tshul du gnas
T02D1660:407a-13: pa la dkyil 'khor gyi lha mos ye shes phab
T02D1660:407a-14: nas rnam rtog nub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
T02D1660:407a-15: par zhugs pa na slob dpon gyis 'og nas 'byung
T02D1660:407a-16: ba'i shi ba slong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon
T02D1660:407a-17: nas / gyis blang zhing / btsun mo yum gyi
T02D1660:407a-18: bha ga'i gos kyis gsang ba'i rdo rje dga' ba'i
T02D1660:407a-19: sbyor bas bdag gi byang chub kyi sems bskul bar
T02D1660:407a-20: nas / gyis blang zhing / bya ste / thabs
T02D1660:407a-21: dang shes rab gnyis ka'i nam mkha'i rtsa'i dbus su
T02D1660:407a-22: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma zla ba zhes bya
T02D1660:407a-23: ba thabs shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems 'khor
T02D1660:407a-24: lo bzhi'i ri las 'das nas dung can ma'i nam
T02D1660:407a-25: mkha'i dbus su shar ba dag bla ma'i man ngag
T02D1660:407a-26: gi stobs kyis nges shes drangs nas ma bying zhing
T02D1660:407a-28: sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur zhing bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:407a-29: de nyid rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:407a-30: nges pa'i lam zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:407a-31: nges pa'i lam ni kun dang ldan //
T02D1660:407a-32: zhes pa zhi gnas bde ba rtog med par nges
T02D1660:407a-33: pa lhag mthong bde ba stong pa nyid du nges
T02D1660:407a-35: rnam par 'das pas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1660:407a-36: zhes pa rang bzhin brgyad cu las 'das pas na dga' ba bzhis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1660:407a-37: de ltar na bde ba chen po grub pa de
T02D1660:407a-38: las slong bar byed pa ni kun nas slong pa
T02D1660:407a-39: zhes bya ba ni shi ba slong ba'i glu gsungs
T02D1660:407a-40: pas sad par byas pa yin no //
T02D1660:407a-42: stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor ba //
T02D1660:407a-44: dpal khyod bdag ces pa'i bar du bstan to //
T02D1660:407a-46: 'di dag nyid glur blangs pa nas //
T02D1660:407b-0: ci @407b zhig smos zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02D1660:407b-1: slob ma shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob pa de lam dus dang ldan pa yin snyam na /
T02D1660:407b-2: lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pas //
T02D1660:407b-3: rnam par 'das pas mdzes par byas //
T02D1660:407b-5: dga' ba'i dus su stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1660:407b-6: mchog dga'i dus su shin tu stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1660:407b-7: lhan cig skyes dga'i dus su chen po'i stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1660:407b-8: 'od gsal ba'i dus su rnam pa thams cad kyi
T02D1660:407b-9: stong pa nyid dang ldan pa ni lam bzhi dang
T02D1660:407b-10: ldan pa'o // de yang rang bzhin brgyad cu las
T02D1660:407b-11: 'das pas gnyis su med pa dang gnyis su brtags
T02D1660:407b-12: ldan pa'o // pa nub nas / kun brtags dang /
T02D1660:407b-13: gzhan dbang gi rtog pa dang bral te gnyis su
T02D1660:407b-14: med pa rang bzhin du mdzes par byas pa yin
T02D1660:407b-15: no // de yang bde mchog las /
T02D1660:407b-16: mchod pa de bzhin rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1660:407b-17: dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi //
T02D1660:407b-21: sems snang ba rnam pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin du 'jug par gsungs pa dang /
T02D1660:407b-22: 'di nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las kyang /
T02D1660:407b-23: sems can bsod nams cher 'phags shing //
T02D1660:407b-24: rnam gnyis mi g-yo de nyid bdag / sems kyi 'du byed g-yo ba ste //
T02D1660:407b-25: 'dus byas thams cad nyid du snang //
T02D1660:407b-27: dga' ba bzhi'i dus bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:407b-28: sna tshogs 'brang ba shin tu grub //
T02D1660:407b-30: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rjes su 'brang bar rnam par smin pa dang /
T02D1660:407b-33: 'jig rten gsum ni rab grub pa //
T02D1660:407b-35: sems snang ba gsum 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin du grub pa'o //
T02D1660:407b-36: 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D1660:407b-38: ji ltar tshul [*chu la?] chu bzhag dang //
T02D1660:407b-39: ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
T02D1660:407b-40: rang gis rang gi ye shes ni //
T02D1660:407b-43: 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po ni sems kyi de kho na shes na /
T02D1660:407b-44: chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:408a-2: zhes pa shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag lus ngag sems bde ba'o //
T02D1660:408a-3: 'jig rten gsum po bdag la bsgrub //
T02D1660:408a-5: thams cad 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin du grub pa'o //
T02D1660:408a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal 'byor ba //
T02D1660:408a-7: lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yin //
T02D1660:408a-8: sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po //
T02D1660:408a-11: chags lam pa las kyi phyag rgya dang sbyor ba dang /
T02D1660:408a-12: grol lam chos dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang
T02D1660:408a-13: sbyor bas dga' ba gsum gyi rol pa aa ra
T02D1660:408a-14: li kun du grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:408a-15: nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa'i //
T02D1660:408a-16: lha mo kun dang bde mos pas //
T02D1660:408a-17: zhes pa phyag rgya chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D1660:408a-18: rang bzhin byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
T02D1660:408a-19: rtsa dgu stong nyid kyi lha mo dang /
T02D1660:408a-20: sgyu ma lta bu ci bde ba ro gcig par
T02D1660:408a-21: mos pas zag pa med pa'i dpal rdo rje sems
T02D1660:408a-22: dpa' 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yang dag par rdzogs
T02D1660:408a-23: par 'gyur ro // shes rab kyi ye shes dang
T02D1660:408a-24: dbang bzhi pas lan cig nyams su myong nas dus
T02D1660:408a-25: thams cad du stong pa nyid ji ltar shes par
T02D1660:408a-26: par 'gyur ro // 'gyur snyam nas / nyi ma gsal bar 'char ba yi //
T02D1660:408a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag sbyor //
T02D1660:408a-29: 'khor lo bzhi la byang chub sems nyi zla'i tshul
T02D1660:408a-30: du gsal nas aa wa dh'u t'i'i sgor 'char ba'i
T02D1660:408a-31: tshe / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gsungs //
T02D1660:408a-33: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi mkha' 'gro ma bde
T02D1660:408a-34: ba stong pa nyid kyi sgyu ma'i tshogs pa 'byung
T02D1660:408a-35: ba la / lan cig bla ma'i man ngag gi
T02D1660:408a-36: stobs kyis nges pa drangs shing dmigs pa la dus
T02D1660:408a-39: rnam pa thams cad la bde ba'i dngos grub kun gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:408a-40: gal te bde ba stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig la
T02D1660:408a-41: dmigs nas srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud nas brtan
T02D1660:408a-42: zhing grub par 'gyur ba'i tshe ji ltar bya snyam
T02D1660:408a-43: na slong bar byed ces gsungs te /
T02D1660:408a-47: mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i glu gandha rbha ste /
T02D1660:408a-48: dri za can zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1660:408a-49: sardza ste drug ldan zhes bya ba'i 'og nas 'byung
T02D1660:408b-0: ba'i glu blangs pas bde ba @408b chen po'i ting
T02D1660:408b-2: de nas rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las ye shes phab
T02D1660:408b-3: nas nye bar bsdu ba bzhin du 'dir yang blta
T02D1660:408b-4: bar bya'o // rjes su chags pa rnam mang zhes pa nas /
T02D1660:408b-5: bde ba grub par mdzod ces pa'i bar du me long lta bu'i zung 'jug bshad do //
T02D1660:408b-6: kye mchog ces pa nas rol cig ho zhes pa'i
T02D1660:408b-7: bar du mnyam pa nyid kyi zung 'jug bshad do
T02D1660:408b-8: // kye mchog tu gsang ba zhes pa nas /
T02D1660:408b-9: gsal bar mkhyen zhes pa'i bar du so sor rtog pa'i zung 'jug bshad do //
T02D1660:408b-10: dam tshig thams cad ces pa nas /
T02D1660:408b-11: rab tu bsgrubs la ston pa zhes pa'i bar du bya ba nan tan gyi zung 'jug bshad do //
T02D1660:408b-12: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes pa nas /
T02D1660:408b-13: aa la la ho zhes pa'i bar gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi zung 'jug bshad do //
T02D1660:408b-14: de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du sgra
T02D1660:408b-15: brnyan na lta bu'i glus bskul nas rnam par shes
T02D1660:408b-16: pa'i 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin dbang bzhi pa 'jug
T02D1660:408b-17: pa yin pa de bas na /
T02D1660:408b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro sgyu
T02D1660:408b-19: ma sna tshogs kyis slob ma gzhug par gsol zhes
T02D1660:408b-21: de ltar sgra brnyan lta bu'i glus bskul nas chos
T02D1660:408b-22: kyi dbyings dbang bzhi pas rang gi sems kyi chos
T02D1660:408b-24: chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid rtogs nas bde ba chen pos rgyas gdab pa'i phyir /
T02D1660:408b-25: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam 'phrul ma lus shing
T02D1660:408b-26: lus pa med par snang ba zhes bya ba glu'i
T02D1660:408b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi gnas ;
T02D1660:408b-30: sems 'od gsal ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1660:408b-31: sgyu ma kun gyi bde mchog ces pa /
T02D1660:408b-32: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor sgyu ma las snang srid lha'i 'khor lor rtogs pa'i bde mchog dang /
T02D1660:408b-33: lus kyi dkyil 'khor las gsang ba'i dbang gi sgyu
T02D1660:408b-34: ma las snang srid sgyu mar rtogs pa'i bde mchog
T02D1660:408b-35: dang / bha ga'i dkyil 'khor du shes rab ye
T02D1660:408b-36: shes kyi dbang gi sgyu ma las yum gyi stong
T02D1660:408b-37: pa nyid kyi bde mchog rtogs pa dang /
T02D1660:408b-38: rang gi sems kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang bzhi
T02D1660:408b-39: pa'i sgyu ma las rnam par mi rtog pa zag
T02D1660:409a-0: pa med pa'i bde mchog rtogs pa @409a * //
T02D1660:409a-2: da ni chos thams cad la khyab pa'i sa dang
T02D1660:409a-3: po rab tu dga' ba'i kun du 'gro ba'i bde
T02D1660:409a-4: mchog ston pa'i glu ni rnam pa mang po 'dod
T02D1660:409a-5: chags rgyud kyi zhes pa nas /
T02D1660:409a-6: te na te te h'um zhes pa'i bar gyis snang
T02D1660:409a-7: srid me long lta ba'i zur du 'jug pa'i ye
T02D1660:409a-9: / rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud //
T02D1660:409a-11: h'um h'um h'um zhes pa'i bar gyis snang srid mnyam
T02D1660:409a-12: pa nyid kyi zung 'jug pa'i ye shes bshad do
T02D1660:409a-13: // rnam pa mang po khro bo'i rgyud //
T02D1660:409a-15: ru lu ru lu h'um bhyo h'um zhes pa'i bar
T02D1660:409a-16: gyis snang srid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1660:409a-18: rnam pa mang po srog gi rgyud //
T02D1660:409a-20: h'um shi ya a'a be sha h'um zhes pa'i bar
T02D1660:409a-21: gyis snang srid thams cad bya ba grub pa'i ye
T02D1660:409a-23: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i skad kyis me long
T02D1660:409a-24: lta bu'i chos nyid ni 'dod chags kyi rgyud yin
T02D1660:409a-25: la / mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid ni rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud yin zhing /
T02D1660:409a-26: so sor rtog pa'i chos nyid ni khro bo'i rgyud yin te /
T02D1660:409a-27: bya ba grub pa'i chos nyid ni srog gi rgyud ces bya ba /
T02D1660:409a-28: rang byung thams cad kyi la glu'i mu dra zhes grags so //
T02D1660:409a-29: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa
T02D1660:409a-30: chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa'i sgra brnyan lta bu'i
T02D1660:409a-31: glu mtha' yas pas gdul bya mtha' yas pa 'grub
T02D1660:409a-32: pa'i dbang phyug sems 'od gsal grub nas /
T02D1660:409a-33: snang srid thams cad 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin du grub pa'o //
T02D1660:409a-34: lha mo kun gyis rab bskul nas //
T02D1660:409a-35: zhes pa sngar bshad pa'i glu gnyis so //
T02D1660:409a-36: de dag nyid bde mchog ma dang /
T02D1660:409a-39: slob ma mo dang bzhis glus bskul ba yin no //
T02D1660:409a-40: de ltar rnal 'byor ba bdag nyid kyis gsang ba shes rab ye shes dbang bzhi pa thob nas /
T02D1660:409a-41: da ni slob ma rnams la dkyil 'khor drug gi
T02D1660:409a-42: tshogs kyi 'khor lo mi 'dra ba drug mdzad nas
T02D1660:409a-44: bha ga chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor drug la slob ma drug dbang bskur ba gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:409b-0: dbang po kun las phyung ba'i zhes smos @409b te ;
T02D1660:409b-1: rgyu'i he ru ka drug gi thabs shes rab gnyis
T02D1660:409b-2: su med pa'i mkha' gsang las byung ba'i mchod pa'i
T02D1660:409b-3: lha mo gling bu ma la sogs pa dang /
T02D1660:409b-4: me tog ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi bkod pas bdag nyid yab yum mchod la /
T02D1660:409b-5: bha ga dang rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1660:409b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro
T02D1660:409b-7: ma sgyu ma bde mchog rigs bzhi'i dngos po kun
T02D1660:409b-8: gyi bdag nyid kyi lus su snang srid thams cad
T02D1660:409b-9: ma lus par 'grub pa yin no //
T02D1660:409b-10: de ltar rigs drug gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskyed pa mdor bstan nas /
T02D1660:409b-12: ston pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yis //
T02D1660:409b-14: rigs drug gi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su bskyed
T02D1660:409b-15: la ye shes phab nas bsnyen sgrub bzhis bud med
T02D1660:409b-17: rdo rje 'khor lo thod pa rin po che /
T02D1660:409b-18: sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams ba'i lha mor 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:409b-19: de dag kyang rang gi lha mo 'dra bar ye
T02D1660:409b-20: shes phab nas bsgrubs na ye shes babs pa dang
T02D1660:409b-21: / sngon ma byung ba'i rol mo sil snyan gar
T02D1660:409b-22: dang rnam par 'phrul pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D1660:409b-23: / // ye shes babs na sngon ma byung ba'i
T02D1660:409b-24: lha'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i bde ba gang
T02D1660:409b-25: yin pa yid la mos par rang nyid lhar mthong
T02D1660:409b-26: ba'i tshe mchod par byad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:409b-27: lha'i mchod pa mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1660:409b-28: zhes bya ba'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1660:409b-29: brgyad cu dang bral ba'i rtog med skal ba bzang
T02D1660:409b-30: po mchog gi bde pa stong pa'i 'dod chags can
T02D1660:409b-31: / slob ma kun la skal ba bzang po'i bde ba sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02D1660:409b-32: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis sgyu ma'i byin gyis
T02D1660:409b-33: brlabs pas zag med kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i bde
T02D1660:409b-34: ba dang mnyam par sbyor ba rtog pa drug gi
T02D1660:409b-35: dkyil 'khor kun gyi bde ba rnams /
T02D1660:409b-36: dkyil 'khor drug gi mthong ba las dga' ba bzhi'i
T02D1660:409b-37: bde ba myong ba'i mthu nyid kyis dkyil 'khor drug
T02D1660:409b-38: gi lha brgya rtsa brgyad bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor skal
T02D1660:409b-39: ba bzang po brgya rtsa brgyad rang rang gi lha'i
T02D1660:409b-40: lus ngag yid kyi bde ba nyid kyis 'grub pa
T02D1660:410a-1: / tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i dga' bzhi'i ting
T02D1660:410a-2: nge 'dzin bstan nas tshogs kyi yul chos kyi phyag
T02D1660:410a-4: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs can dang //
T02D1660:410a-6: lha'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i yid du 'ong
T02D1660:410a-7: ba'i bdag nyid la dga' ba bzhi'i bde ba bsgoms
T02D1660:410a-8: pas dngos grub ma lus pa 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D1660:410a-9: // de ltar tshogs 'khor rdzogs pa'i tshe /
T02D1660:410a-10: rnal 'byor pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyi ched du brjod pa ni /
T02D1660:410a-11: aom sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D1660:410a-12: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog gsang //
T02D1660:410a-13: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gar //
T02D1660:410a-14: rnam par rol pa mchog tu snang //
T02D1660:410a-16: de nas rang rang gi yum bzhi'i glus 'khor lo drug la bstod pa gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:410a-17: de nas yang dag rab bsang ba //
T02D1660:410a-19: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la bde mchog ma dang /
T02D1660:410a-22: slob ma mo'i bud med bzhis bstod par bsam mo //
T02D1660:410a-27: mig gzang ma dang bzhis bstod par bsam mo //
T02D1660:410a-32: be t'a l'is bstod par bsam mo //
T02D1660:410a-37: khro gnyer ma bzhis bskul bar bsam mo //
T02D1660:410a-38: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ma /
T02D1660:410a-41: las mchog ma bzhis bstod par bsam mo //
T02D1660:410a-43: zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod kyi lha mo bzhis bskul bar bsam mo //
T02D1660:410a-45: rab tu dga' ba zhes pa nas thams cad 'grub par mdzod ces pa'i bar gyis bshad do //
T02D1660:410a-46: glu de dag gi phan yon ni /
T02D1660:410a-47: glu'i phyag rgya 'di yis las rab 'byam la 'byor ba'i yang bstod pa dang /
T02D1660:410a-48: dngos grub 'grub par ma gyur ba'i tshe bstod pa dang /
T02D1660:410a-49: yo byad ma 'byor ba'i tshes byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:410b-0: yang slob ma 'jug pa'i tshe @410b glu'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang /
T02D1660:410b-1: sngar bshad pa'i lha mo bzhi po dag gis me
T02D1660:410b-2: tog la sogs pa lag tu thogs nas slob ma
T02D1660:410b-3: thams cad dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe mchod pa
T02D1660:410b-4: bya'o // de ltar tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor drug ni slob dpon gyi cho bshad nas //
T02D1660:410b-5: da ni slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad de /
T02D1660:410b-6: mchog tu gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa dngos grub 'dod pa'i rgyun bshags dang /
T02D1660:410b-8: sems bskyed pa phyi rol du las thams cad ba'i
T02D1660:410b-9: bum pas dbang bskur nas ci rigs par rigs drug
T02D1660:410b-10: gi snyems pa'i gar kun nas bskor zhing spyod pa
T02D1660:410b-12: rigs drug gi kha dog gi ras kyis gdong g-yogs la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1660:410b-13: de ltar dngos grub thob par 'dod pa'i slob ma
T02D1660:410b-14: la ye shes phab nas phreng ba dor zhing bcing
T02D1660:410b-15: ba dang / gdong g-yogs dgrol ba dang /
T02D1660:410b-17: de nas yon gyi mchog blangs te /
T02D1660:410b-19: cod pan rdo rje dril bu ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1660:410b-20: de ltar bum pa'i dbang bskur nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ni /
T02D1660:410b-21: dmar chen po dang ga bur bcas //
T02D1660:410b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:410b-24: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni /
T02D1660:410b-25: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1660:410b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:410b-27: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha'
T02D1660:410b-28: 'gro ma sgyu ma'i tshogs kyi bha ga'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1660:410b-29: lo ; / des kyang rgyas mi 'debs pa ni
T02D1660:410b-30: bde ba rtog med la rang bzhin brgyad cu'i zil
T02D1660:410b-31: lo ; gyis gnon pa'o // rmongs pa ni bde
T02D1660:410b-32: ba stong pa nyid rtog pa la gzung 'dzin gyi
T02D1660:410b-34: de la gnon par mi 'gyur te //
T02D1660:410b-35: zhes pas sems kyi stong pa nyid dbang bzhi pa rtogs pa la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1660:410b-36: de nas slob ma dbang bskur ba'i rjes la /
T02D1660:410b-37: dbang bzhi ba'i man ngag bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:410b-38: de nas man ngag ni bsgrag par bya zhes pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:410b-39: sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa'i zhes pa nas /
T02D1660:411a-0: snying la khrag chen 'phung ba zhig / ces pa'i bar @411a * //
T02D1660:411a-1: du man ngag bsgrags pa bstan to //
T02D1660:411a-2: dbugs dbyung ba bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:411a-3: sems can khams ni ma lus don //
T02D1660:411a-5: rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal te //
T02D1660:411a-6: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02D1660:411a-7: de nas rigs bzhi'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa ston pa las /
T02D1660:411a-8: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni //
T02D1660:411a-9: rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i //
T02D1660:411a-10: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:411a-11: rnal 'byor bcas pa ni tshogs 'khor ro //
T02D1660:411a-12: gsang bcas ni zhi ba'i btung ba'o //
T02D1660:411a-13: bdag gis phyag rgya sgrub ces pa pho nya'i gtsang sbra'o //
T02D1660:411a-14: lha yi tshul bzhin gar byed pas //
T02D1660:411a-15: slob ma rnams la bde ba sbyin //
T02D1660:411a-16: zhes pa gtsang sbra gsum gyi man ngag bstan to //
T02D1660:411a-17: slob ma mchog gi rnal 'byor ba de /
T02D1660:411a-18: de phyin chad sngags skyes zhing skyes ye shes las skyes pa'i phyag rgya bzung nas /
T02D1660:411a-19: rnam snang dang sangs rgyas spyan bzhin du sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:411a-20: de nas ro dang zhes pa nas /
T02D1660:411a-21: bdag dang gzhan la 'dod dgur mchod //
T02D1660:411a-22: ces pa'i bar gyis gal te bdag nyid dga' bral
T02D1660:411a-23: du song na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1660:411a-26: rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1660:411a-27: byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya /
T02D1660:411a-29: de nas bdag nyid gtsang sbra gsum bsgrubs nas kun
T02D1660:411a-30: gyi slob dpon du rab tu gnas nas rang bzhin
T02D1660:411a-31: brgyad cu dang bral ba rtog med kyi bde ba
T02D1660:411a-32: stong pa nyid la ji lta bu'i tshul gyis slob
T02D1660:411a-33: ma 'jug pa la bden pa'i chos zhes brjod par
T02D1660:411a-34: bya'o // rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsang sbra gsum gyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'o //
T02D1660:411a-35: da ni rnam snang gi gtsang sbra gsum gyi phyag rgya sgrub pa ni /
T02D1660:411a-36: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul //
T02D1660:411a-38: rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsang sbra gsum gyi bsgrub cing
T02D1660:411a-39: rtog pa kun gyi lhar sgom pas tshogs kyi 'khor
T02D1660:411a-40: lo chen po byed par 'dod pas bsnyen sgrub bzhi
T02D1660:411a-41: sna tshogs kyi las kyi sbyor ba dang /
T02D1660:411a-42: chags lam grol lam gyis 'dul ba'i bdag nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs pas /
T02D1660:411b-0: @411b sems can gyi mos pa mtha' yas pa 'dul
T02D1660:411b-1: ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor de las
T02D1660:411b-2: gzhan pa rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor bstan to //
T02D1660:411b-3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid kyis
T02D1660:411b-4: zhi ba'i skus 'dul ba'i thar ba thams cad sbyangs
T02D1660:411b-5: nas / grol ba'i mkha' 'gro rnam snang gi dkyil
T02D1660:411b-6: 'khor bskyed nas rnal 'byor pho mo rang gi lha
T02D1660:411b-7: dang 'dra bar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1660:411b-8: mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D1660:411b-9: rang gi phyag rgya dang ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D1660:411b-10: rjes su mthun pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i tshogs
T02D1660:411b-11: 'khor dang / zhi ba'i btung ba pho nya'i gtsang sbra bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1660:411b-12: he ru ka'i gtsang sbra gsum bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:411b-15: zhe sdang sbyang ba'i phyir he ru ka'i gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:411b-16: padma gar gyi gtsang sbra ni /
T02D1660:411b-17: gzhan ni shun tu rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1660:411b-18: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:411b-19: log ltas kun nas bslang ba'i 'dod chags sbyong ba'i
T02D1660:411b-20: phyir skal pa bzang po mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal
T02D1660:411b-21: 'byor ba la padma gar dbang gi gtsang sbra gsum
T02D1660:411b-22: gsungs pa'o // rdo rje nyi ma'i gtsang sgra gsum gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:411b-25: ser sna can sbyang ba'i phyir rdo rje nyi ma'i gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:411b-26: rta mchog gi gtsang sbra ni /
T02D1660:411b-29: drag shul can gyi gang zag sbyang ba'i phyir rta mchog gi gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa yin no ;
T02D1660:411b-30: / de ltar gtsang sbra bshad nas rtag pa drug
T02D1660:411b-31: gi rnal 'byor pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dpa' bo
T02D1660:411b-32: gcig pa brgya rtsa brgyad bsgoms la rang gi las
T02D1660:411b-33: kyi phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad byin gyis brlabs nas
T02D1660:411b-34: bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1660:411b-35: rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis //
T02D1660:411b-36: rang gi byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs pa //
T02D1660:411b-37: gzugs brnyan ngo bo sbyor ba yis //
T02D1660:411b-38: sangs rgyas sbyor ba gar bya'o //
T02D1660:411b-40: lha brgya rtsa brgyad kyi nga rgyal byas nas rang gi lha brgya rtsa brgyad byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1660:412a-0: tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhi ba btung ba pho nya'i gtsang sgra'i dam tshig rnam pa sna @412a * //
T02D1660:412a-1: tshogs kyis de ltar dga' bzhi spyad pas sangs rgyas
T02D1660:412a-2: thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde mchog 'grub
T02D1660:412a-3: par 'gyur ro // rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhin
T02D1660:412a-4: du rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'dod pas
T02D1660:412a-5: dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor shar du
T02D1660:412a-7: nub tu padma gar dbang gi / lhor rdo rje nyi ma'i /
T02D1660:412a-8: byang du rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhag la sgrub pa'am /
T02D1660:412a-11: rdo rje nyi ma gzhag par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1660:412a-12: kun du kun nas thams cad du //
T02D1660:412a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:412a-14: gnas kun du dus thams cad du sangs rgyas thams
T02D1660:412a-15: cad kyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'khor thams cad bdag
T02D1660:412a-16: nyid thams cad kyi sgo nas rnam pa kun du
T02D1660:412a-17: sangs rgyas la so sor 'khor lo rten gzhal yas
T02D1660:412a-19: g-yo ba lha'i rang bzhin gyis bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1660:412a-20: mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni dbus su rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor gzhag pa ni /
T02D1660:412a-21: dbus su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1660:412a-22: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:412a-23: rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis so //
T02D1660:412a-24: lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba'i rnam snang gi bdag nyid kyi rnam 'phrul ston pa dang /
T02D1660:412a-25: 'khor gyi lha mo gling bu ma dang /
T02D1660:412a-26: me tog ma la sogs pa /
T02D1660:412a-27: rta gdong ma la sogs pa lha mo bcu gnyis
T02D1660:412a-28: kyis phyi rol gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus
T02D1660:412a-29: pa sangs rgyas sprul pa 'grub par byed pa yin
T02D1660:412a-30: no // de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi ka ba'i
T02D1660:412a-31: dbus su sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku ma rdo rje
T02D1660:412a-32: sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
T02D1660:412a-33: lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba bzhag la /
T02D1660:412a-34: 'khor gyi lha mo bcu gnyis ni thun mong du gzhag pa yin no //
T02D1660:412a-35: de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su padma gar dbang gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni /
T02D1660:412a-37: zhes pa la sogs pa yin no //
T02D1660:412a-38: lho phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su rdo rje nyi
T02D1660:412b-0: ma'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni khams @412b gsum pa
T02D1660:412b-1: la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:412b-2: byang phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni /
T02D1660:412b-3: khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che //
T02D1660:412b-4: bdag gdul spyod pas zhes gsungs so //
T02D1660:412b-5: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa
T02D1660:412b-6: brgya rtsa brgyad gang rung dbus su gtso bor byas
T02D1660:412b-7: pa ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa yin
T02D1660:412b-8: no // dpal dgyes rol pa'i rnam 'phrul ba //
T02D1660:412b-9: zhes pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas sprul pa'o //
T02D1660:412b-10: sna tshogs kun gyis rnam par rol //
T02D1660:412b-11: zhes pa 'dul byed kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D1660:412b-12: rnam pa sna tshogs skal bzang po //
T02D1660:412b-13: zhes pa gdul bya sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D1660:412b-14: rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog gis //
T02D1660:412b-15: zhes gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D1660:412b-16: gdul bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1660:412b-17: sems can khams ni rab tu bsgrubs //
T02D1660:412b-18: zhes pas mchog tu grub pa'i rnam 'byor pa mtha' yas pas rtog med du bsgrubs pa'o //
T02D1660:412b-19: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa
T02D1660:412b-20: bla ma gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rim pas
T02D1660:412b-21: rtog pa drug gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang
T02D1660:412b-22: / dpa' bo re re bsgom pa dang /
T02D1660:412b-23: rtog pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa bsgoms
T02D1660:412b-24: pas thams cad kyi bdag nyid grub pa gsungs so
T02D1660:412b-27: // / de ltar gleng gzhi de kho na nyid snang
T02D1660:412b-28: ba'i yul la 'jug pas zhes pas gnas lugs bstan
T02D1660:412b-31: dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'i le'u gsum gyi bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D1660:412b-32: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i thabs kyis mtshan ma thob par byas nas /
T02D1660:412b-33: dbugs dbyung ba rtog pa drug gi sngon byung sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku'i mdzad pa dang mthun par /
T02D1660:412b-34: rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms la /
T02D1660:412b-35: las dang po pa bsgrub par 'dod pa'ang rung /
T02D1660:412b-36: mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa'ang rung /
T02D1660:412b-37: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'ang rung ste /
T02D1660:412b-38: dbugs dbyung drug gi grangs dang /
T02D1660:413a-1: mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa bya ba bstan nas /
T02D1660:413a-2: bsnyen pa grub pa'i rjes la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang /
T02D1660:413a-3: rnal 'byor ma lha'i cha byang du byas pas las bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02D1660:413a-5: gzhan la phan 'dogs pa bstan pa yin no //
T02D1660:413a-6: da ni gzugs brnyan lugs su blugs pa'am /
T02D1660:413a-7: 'bur du brkos pa'am ri mor bris pa'i rdul tshon
T02D1660:413a-8: gyi dkyil 'khor la mos pa'i ngor dbyugs dbyung pa
T02D1660:413a-9: drug gi bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02D1660:413a-10: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bri pa gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:413a-11: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1660:413a-12: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:413a-13: rdo rje sems dpa' sna tshogs kun gyi mchog gi
T02D1660:413a-14: 'khor lo drug gi gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor sprul
T02D1660:413a-15: par bzhed pas / gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa
T02D1660:413a-16: rdul tshon gyi bdag nyid du bstan pa yin no
T02D1660:413a-17: par bzhed pas / // gsang ba dpal he ru
T02D1660:413a-18: ka mchog ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug dgyes pa
T02D1660:413a-20: bdag gi rta mchog gi brtag pa rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D1660:413a-21: rjes su bsgrub pa rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gsungs pas /
T02D1660:413a-22: rdul tshon drug gi bsgrub pa yin no //
T02D1660:413a-23: de la yang bye brag gi rigs gnas gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:413a-25: ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D1660:413a-26: zhes bya bas rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:413a-27: rten dang dgon pa zhes pa nas bsgrub par bya
T02D1660:413a-28: zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam snang gi gnas gsungs pa'o
T02D1660:413a-29: // dur khrod ces pa nas bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis he ru ka'i gnas gsungs pa'o //
T02D1660:413a-30: padma zhes pa nas grub par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyis padma gar dbang gi gnas gsungs so //
T02D1660:413a-31: rgyal po zhes pa nas bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje nyi ma'i gnas gsungs pa'o //
T02D1660:413a-32: 'khor ni zhes pa nas bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis rta mchog gi gnas gsungs pa'o //

T02D1660:413a-34: rnal 'byor ba'i cha lugs dang rdzas bsags pa bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:413a-36: rta mchog rdo rje can gyis so //
T02D1660:413a-37: zhes pa'i bar gyis ston to //
T02D1660:413b-0: zhes pa gnas kyi rten gyi 'khor lo drug @413b go ;
T02D1660:413b-1: /'khor gyi rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor ba rigs su
T02D1660:413b-2: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ma byas na rigs drug la
T02D1660:413b-3: lha brgya rtsa brgyad yin no //
T02D1660:413b-4: rigs bsdus byas na phyogs bzhir gtso bo dgu dgu sum cu rtsa drug yin la /
T02D1660:413b-5: 'khor gling bu ma la sogs pa dang /
T02D1660:413b-6: me tog ma la sogs pa dang /
T02D1660:413b-7: rta gdong ma la sogs pa bzhi yang drug drug
T02D1660:413b-8: dgod pas lha bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha brgya
T02D1660:413b-10: phrin las bzhi ni rta mchog dang /
T02D1660:413b-11: yab yum gsum so sor bgrangs pa'i brtsi bar mi bya'o //
T02D1660:413b-12: bkod pa ni dbyibs yin te /
T02D1660:413b-13: gzhal yas khang gi dbyibs dang lha'i sku mdog dang /
T02D1660:413b-14: phyag mtshan gyi dbyibs yin no //
T02D1660:413b-15: bkod pa rigs drug gi gtso bo ste ci 'dra

T02D1660:417a-4: thal mo padma kha 'bus pa bzhin byas pa las mthe bo mthe chung bzhi bsnyams nas phyag bya'o //
T02D1660:417a-5: rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag 'tshal ba'i rdo rje thal mo ni /
T02D1660:417a-6: lus kyi yan lag thams cad ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:417a-7: lus kyi yan lag thams cad sa la bsnyal nas phyag bya'o //
T02D1660:417a-8: rta mchog gi phyag bya ba'i thal mo ni /
T02D1660:417a-9: dpal rdo rje 'gying ba'i thal mo zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:417a-10: 'dzum pa'i mig gis blta zhing gar byas la phyag bya'o //
T02D1660:417a-11: thams cad kyi thun mong gi phyag 'tshal ba'i sngags ni /
T02D1660:417a-16: de ltar phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02D1660:417a-17: gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pas gar byas nas mchod pa bya ba bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:417a-18: gar gyi nyams dgu ji snyed dang //
T02D1660:417a-19: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:417a-20: sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung bas sku'i nyams /
T02D1660:417a-21: dgod pa gshe ba rngam pa gsung gi nyams /
T02D1660:417a-22: snying rje zhi ba ngo mtshar ba thugs kyi nyams so //
T02D1660:417a-23: de yang 'gying ba'i nyams dang bcas pas gar bskor nas dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1660:417a-24: de ltar gtso bo'i gar bshad nas /
T02D1660:417a-26: lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis dag gis //
T02D1660:417a-27: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:417a-28: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la g-yas pa
T02D1660:417a-29: ba dan gsum par byas la gar bya ba ni
T02D1660:417a-33: slob ma mo rnams kyi nyams kyi tshul du gar bya'o //
T02D1660:417a-34: gling bu ma la sogs pa'i gar bya ba ni /
T02D1660:417a-35: snyems 'dzin chen mo bcangs pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:417a-36: snyems pa dang bcas pas gar byas la thal mo 'gram pa gnyis dang spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02D1660:417a-37: de yang phab nas gling bu ma nas thal byed
T02D1660:417a-38: ma'i bar gyi lha mo bcu gnyis gar bya ba
T02D1660:417a-39: yin no // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gar ni /
T02D1660:417b-0: g-yas dang g-yon gyi lag @417b pa yis //
T02D1660:417b-1: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:417b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bcings la de bzhin
T02D1660:417b-3: gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi gar
T02D1660:417b-4: bya'o // he ru ka'i gar ni /
T02D1660:417b-5: lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis dag gis //
T02D1660:417b-6: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:417b-7: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis gar byas la rdo rje thal mo gyen du phye nas bkrol te /
T02D1660:417b-8: he ru ka'i lha thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya gar gyi tshul du byas pa yin no //
T02D1660:417b-9: padma gar dbang gi gar ni /
T02D1660:417b-10: lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis dag gis //
T02D1660:417b-11: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:417b-12: padmo'i khu tshur gnyis kyis gar byas la padma'i thal
T02D1660:417b-13: mo bskor nas gar dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha
T02D1660:417b-14: thams cad kyi p'u dza'i phyag rgyas gar gyis bya
T02D1660:417b-15: ba yin no // rdo rje nyi ma'i gar ni /
T02D1660:417b-16: lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis dag gis //
T02D1660:417b-17: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:417b-18: rin po che'i khu tshur bcings nas gar bya ste /
T02D1660:417b-19: rin po che'i thal mo bskor la rdo rje nyi
T02D1660:417b-20: ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i
T02D1660:417b-21: tshul gyis gar gyi mchod pa bya'o //
T02D1660:417b-22: rta mchog ni las kyi khu tshur las byung ba'i
T02D1660:417b-23: gar byas la las kyi thal mo bskor bas gar
T02D1660:417b-24: gyi phyag rgyas bya ba yin no //
T02D1660:417b-25: dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i lha mo rnams kyi gar ni gyen du 'thor ba me tog ma'i'o //
T02D1660:417b-26: thur du 'debs pa ni bdug pa ma'i'o //
T02D1660:417b-29: lag pa gang yang rung ba ston pa na me
T02D1660:417b-30: tog la sogs ci 'byor pas lag pa bkang ste
T02D1660:417b-31: / rang gi lha'i dam tshig dang mnyam par gar
T02D1660:417b-32: gyi sgrub pas mchod pa byas na mnyes par 'gyur
T02D1660:417b-33: / ro // phyag rgya 'di rnams bcings na ni //
T02D1660:417b-34: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gcig gis phyag rgya bcings pa'i bar gyi phan yon bstan to //
T02D1660:417b-35: chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
T02D1660:417b-37: de yis mi 'grub gang yang med //
T02D1660:417b-38: ces pa'i bar gyis lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas mchod pa byas na /
T02D1660:417b-39: des dngos grub gsum po mi 'grub pa gang yang med do //
T02D1660:417b-41: ji ltar chu la chu gzhag dang //
T02D1660:417b-42: ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
T02D1660:418a-0: rang gis rang gi ye shes @418a * //
T02D1660:418a-2: / legs mthong gang yin 'dir phyag yin //
T02D1660:418a-6: // / de ltar las dang po pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag bshad nas /
T02D1660:418a-7: da ni mchog tu gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa mtshan
T02D1660:418a-8: ma thob pa ye shes cung zad tsam la dbang
T02D1660:418a-9: ba / 'jig rten gyi dngos grub 'gro ba rigs drug gi yon tan dang /
T02D1660:418a-10: thun mong gi dngos grub bsam gtan dang /
T02D1660:418a-11: gzugs med kyi yon tan brgyad dang /
T02D1660:418a-12: mchog gi dngos grub bcu gcig pa bsgrub pa'i yan
T02D1660:418a-13: lag tu gyur pa phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D1660:418a-14: pa phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad gsungs pa ni
T02D1660:418a-15: / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1660:418a-16: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:418a-17: bsgrub pa'i yan lag thabs nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag gi ston pa po gang /
T02D1660:418a-19: 'khor ni su dang lhan cig / dus ni nam gyi tshe /
T02D1660:418a-20: dam pa'i chos ni ci zhig bshad ce na /
T02D1660:418a-21: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa nas /
T02D1660:418a-22: bde ba che zhes pa'i bar gyis ston pa pos bstan to //
T02D1660:418a-23: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa zhes pas gnas bstan to //
T02D1660:418a-24: thams cad bdag nyid ces pas 'khor bstan to //
T02D1660:418a-25: rtag tu zhugs zhes pas dus bstan to //
T02D1660:418a-26: bde ba kun la chags pa dang //
T02D1660:418a-27: zhes pa la sogs pas chos bstan to //
T02D1660:418a-28: bde ba kun zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor lha'i skul zhen pa'o //
T02D1660:418a-29: dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir ni stong pa
T02D1660:418a-30: nyid kyis btab na bde ba chen po rtogs pa'o
T02D1660:418a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / ces gsungs te ;
T02D1660:418a-33: bde ba stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02D1660:418a-34: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:418a-35: zla ba ltar dkar rtsa dmar sku //
T02D1660:418a-36: zhes pa nas dbu rgyan gyi dam pas mdzes zhes
T02D1660:418a-37: pa'i bar gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i sku phyag rgya
T02D1660:418a-38: chen po cod pan dang bcas pa bstan to //
T02D1660:418a-39: gzhan gyi nor min mi 'phrogs pa //
T02D1660:418a-40: zhes pa gzhan gyi nor ma yin pa ni thod pa'o //
T02D1660:418a-41: mi 'phrogs pa ni gzhan la nye bar mi mkho bas so //
T02D1660:418a-42: thod pa'i snod kyi nang gang gi lha'i chu dag pa dang bcas pa ste zhes pa nas /
T02D1660:418a-43: de grub pa po'i zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad
T02D1660:418b-0: gcig gis chu'i dbang @418b bskur ba'i rtags phyogs bzhir
T02D1660:418b-1: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02D1660:418b-2: spyi gtsug tu sangs rgyas kyis gzhag pa ni /
T02D1660:418b-3: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten stong sum
T02D1660:418b-4: bcu gsum pa mi mjed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i
T02D1660:418b-5: rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba yin no //
T02D1660:418b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yi //
T02D1660:418b-9: ces pa'i bar shlo ka gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa' lha mos bskor ba bshad pa yin no //
T02D1660:418b-10: sangs rgyas dang rdo rje dang padma dang nyi ma
T02D1660:418b-11: khams gsum pa'i gdul bya rnams rgyas btab pas dbang
T02D1660:418b-12: byas pa dang / rmongs pas longs spyod pa dang /
T02D1660:418b-13: thim pas blangs nas slar gsol te /
T02D1660:418b-14: srog byin nas las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed pa yin no //
T02D1660:418b-15: de ltar mdzad pa su zhig yin zhe na /
T02D1660:418b-16: phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni /
T02D1660:418b-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku lha mos bskor ba'i sprul skus gdul bya la rgyas btab nas /
T02D1660:418b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:418b-20: rdo rje sems dpa' rkang pa yis //
T02D1660:418b-21: phyag rgyas bcings nas dngos grub 'grub pa bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:418b-22: g-yas dang g-yon gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1660:418b-24: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis so //
T02D1660:418b-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bshad pa nas /
T02D1660:418b-26: yum bzhi'i phyag rgya chen po bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:418b-27: zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal //
T02D1660:418b-29: mi mjed la sogs brgyan pa bzhin //
T02D1660:418b-30: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02D1660:418b-31: de bye brag tu bde mchog ma'i phyag rgya bya ba ni sgeg pa'o //
T02D1660:418b-34: lhag par mdzad pa ni gar gyi nyams gsum dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1660:418b-35: bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis //
T02D1660:418b-36: yan lag thams cad phrog pa 'grub //
T02D1660:418b-38: sgrub pa po'i 'khrud pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas
T02D1660:418b-39: dngos grub ster bar 'gyur te mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o
T02D1660:418b-40: // rnam pa sna tshogs zhes pa nas //
T02D1660:418b-41: rol pa zhes bya'i phyag rgya bzhin //
T02D1660:418b-42: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bdag dang lingga 'khyud pa'i ngo mtshar bde ba mo'i phyag rgya bstan to //
T02D1660:418b-43: se ral kha yi tshul dag tu //
T02D1660:418b-45: bde mchog grol pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1660:419a-1: bar gyis g-yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje g-yon pa kha tv'am ga bsnams pa /
T02D1660:419a-2: snang mdzad pa'i phyag rgyas so //
T02D1660:419a-3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi kham phor 'grub ces pa
T02D1660:419a-4: nas phyag rgya'o zhes pa'i bar gyis g-yas pa sna
T02D1660:419a-5: tshogs rdo rje dang g-yon pa kham phor bsnams pa
T02D1660:419a-6: slob ma mo'i phyag rgya bstan to //
T02D1660:419a-7: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa
T02D1660:419a-8: lha mo de rnams kyi lag pa'i phyag rgya dang
T02D1660:419a-11: ngag gi phyag rgya la sogs pa mtha' yas kyang /
T02D1660:419a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs
T02D1660:419a-13: kyi bdag nyid kyis ye shes phab par 'gyur ro
T02D1660:419a-14: // rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so zhes pa rdo
T02D1660:419a-15: rje sems dpa' yab yum zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1660:419a-16: gtso bo yin pas rtsa ba zhes gsungs so //
T02D1660:419a-17: gtsug lag ji ltar rjes mthun srog / ces pa
T02D1660:419a-18: la sogs pas sangs rgyas byang chub kyi phyag rgya
T02D1660:419a-20: rkang pa bteg cing phab pa dang //
T02D1660:419a-21: zhes pa la sogs pas chos kyi 'khor lo ma'i phyag gya chen po gsungs so //
T02D1660:419a-22: bya ba dang ni zlog pa dang /
T02D1660:419a-23: zhes pa la sogs pas khams gsum rnam rgyal ma'i phyag rgya gsungs so //
T02D1660:419a-24: lcug ma gang yang rung bzung nas //
T02D1660:419a-25: zhes pa la sogs pa 'dod pa'i dbang mo'i phyag rgya gsungs so //
T02D1660:419a-26: myang ba rngub pa ltar byas pas //
T02D1660:419a-27: zhes pa la sogs pas rta mchog gi phyag rgya gsungs so //
T02D1660:419a-28: sna yi myang bas rngub pa yis //
T02D1660:419a-29: zhes pa la sogs pas phag gdong ma'i phyag rgya gsungs so //
T02D1660:419a-30: mig tshur zhen par lta ba yis ;
T02D1660:419a-31: / zhes pa la sogs pa lcags sgrog ma'i phyag rgya gsungs so //
T02D1660:419a-32: thams cad bdag nyid myang ba'o //
T02D1660:419a-33: zhes pa la sogs pas thal byed ma'i phyag rgya gsungs so //
T02D1660:419a-37: rdza rnga ma rnams kyi phyag rgya ni ming gis gsal bar bstan te /
T02D1660:419a-38: phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis //
T02D1660:419a-40: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
T02D1660:419a-41: ces pa'i bar gyis shloka gcig gis me tog mar
T02D1660:419a-42: me dri chab ma rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan to
T02D1660:419a-43: // rims dang dug dang dbyig dug byas //
T02D1660:419a-44: zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D1660:419b-0: @419b zhes pa'i bar gyis lha mo de rnams kyi phyag rgya'i phan yon bstan to //
T02D1660:419b-1: de ltar dngos grub len pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02D1660:419b-2: da ni lha nyi shu rtsa gcig gi thun mong gi glu bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:419b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1660:419b-5: bla na med pa'i dngos grub thob //
T02D1660:419b-6: ces pa'i bar gyis thun mong gi glu bstan to //
T02D1660:419b-7: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa shloka gcig gis phrin las 'grub pa'i phan yon bstan to //
T02D1660:419b-8: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen zhes pa nas
T02D1660:419b-9: gzung du gsol zhes pa'i bar gyis thun mong gi
T02D1660:419b-10: blu bstan to // sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1660:419b-12: thun mong gi sgrub pa'i phan yon gsungs pa'o //
T02D1660:419b-13: de ltar na rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1660:419b-14: dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya dang glu bshad nas
T02D1660:419b-15: / da ni rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos
T02D1660:419b-16: grub len pa'i phyag rgya chen po gsungs pa ni
T02D1660:419b-17: / / rnal 'byor de nyid bha ga w'an //
T02D1660:419b-19: dpal dam tshig shes pa'i phyag rgya'o zhes pa'i bar
T02D1660:419b-20: gyis chos gos lhung bzed gseg shang bsnams pa'i phyag
T02D1660:419b-22: de yi rkang pa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02D1660:419b-23: g-yas pa'i yan lag 'dus pa yis //
T02D1660:419b-24: zhes pa la sogs pas rnam snang gi sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bstan to //
T02D1660:419b-25: rnam snang gi phyag rgya bstan nas /
T02D1660:419b-26: sangs rgyas dbyangs ma'i phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02D1660:419b-27: rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su //
T02D1660:419b-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
T02D1660:419b-29: dpa' bo ma'i phyag rgya ni /
T02D1660:419b-30: de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka / zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02D1660:419b-31: kun du bzang mo'i phyag rgya ni padma bud med ces pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02D1660:419b-32: zad med pa yi phyag rgyas ni //
T02D1660:419b-33: rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang //
T02D1660:419b-34: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02D1660:419b-35: skur ldan ma'i phyag rgya ni /
T02D1660:419b-36: sangs rgyas khu tshur bcangs nas su //
T02D1660:419b-37: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02D1660:419b-38: mdzes pa'i phyag rgya ni padma'i bud med kyi phyag
T02D1660:419b-39: rgya bcings nas zhes pa la sogs pa bstan to
T02D1660:419b-40: // sprin chen ma'i phyag rgya ni /
T02D1660:419b-41: rta mchog dpal gyi khu tshur yang //
T02D1660:419b-42: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02D1660:419b-43: nam mkha' spyan ma'i phyag rgya ni /
T02D1660:420a-2: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02D1660:420a-3: de nas thun mong du mtshan brgyad gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:420a-4: dang po sangs rgyas kun bla ma //
T02D1660:420a-5: zhes pa la sogs pa'i shloka gnyis kyis gsungs so //
T02D1660:420a-6: phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02D1660:420a-7: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yan lag tu glu gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:420a-8: phyag rgya zhes pa 'di dag gi / zhes pa
T02D1660:420a-9: la sogs pas tshigs bcad gnyis kyis glu blang ba'i
T02D1660:420a-10: thabs 'bras bu dang bcas pas bstan to //
T02D1660:420a-11: de las rdza ni drug ldan no //
T02D1660:420a-12: de ba ta zhes pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha mo til mchog dang rim pa'i glu'o //
T02D1660:420a-13: sems can khams mang zhes pa nas di ring 'grub
T02D1660:420a-14: par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam snang gi lha
T02D1660:420a-15: mo thams cad kyi thun mong gi glu gsungs pa
T02D1660:420a-16: yin no // rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i glu dang /
T02D1660:420a-17: rnam snang gi lha mo'i glus ni bdag mtshan ma
T02D1660:420a-18: thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa la lha'i sku bstan nas
T02D1660:420a-20: zhugs par mdzod ces pa'i don yin no //
T02D1660:420a-21: glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis //
T02D1660:420a-22: zhes pa nas gdon mi za zhes pa'i bar gyis sgrub pa'i phan yon gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:420a-23: de las bud med bzhi rnams zhes pa ni gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1660:420a-24: me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1660:420a-25: rta gdong ma la sogs pa bzhi'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis mchod cing /
T02D1660:420a-26: dngos grub bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1660:420a-27: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya chen po bshad nas /
T02D1660:420a-28: da ni he ru ka'i dngos grub len pa'i phyag
T02D1660:420a-29: rgya chen po bstan pa ni rnal 'byor de nyid
T02D1660:420a-30: bha ga w'an // zhes pa nas /
T02D1660:420a-31: rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug gi / zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02D1660:420a-33: dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgyas gnas //
T02D1660:420a-34: zhes pa rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1660:420a-35: gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrogs zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis chu'i dbang bskur ba bstan to //
T02D1660:420a-36: gos chen po ni mi lpags so //
T02D1660:420a-37: dbang bskur chen po ni thod pa'i cod pan lnga'o //
T02D1660:420a-38: sha chen dang sbrang rtsi chen po ni /
T02D1660:420a-39: phyag g-yon na bsnams pa'i sbrang rtsi ste /
T02D1660:420a-40: sha chen po dang khrag gis gang ba'o //
T02D1660:420a-41: ci'i phyir bha ga w'an de lta bu bsnams she na /
T02D1660:420b-0: dur khrod @420b brgyad kyi 'byung bo rnams gdul ba'i phyir /
T02D1660:420b-1: thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D1660:420b-2: thod pa'i phreng ba dang mi bskyod pas gtsug gi nor bu byas pa'o //
T02D1660:420b-3: kha tv'am bcas zhes pas phyag mtshan bstan to //
T02D1660:420b-4: phyag mtshan des ci zhig byed snyam nas /
T02D1660:420b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdul bya dang //
T02D1660:420b-6: rdo rje padma nor bu sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdul
T02D1660:420b-7: bya rnams dbang du bya ba gsum gyis rgyas btab
T02D1660:420b-8: pa dang / btsun mo la longs spyod pas rmongs par byas pa dang /
T02D1660:420b-9: tshogs 'khor la longs spyod pas zab pa dang /
T02D1660:420b-10: srog thim pas thal bar gyur ba'o //
T02D1660:420b-11: de ltar zhal bzhi phyag brgyad bshad nas /
T02D1660:420b-12: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D1660:420b-13: se ra la kha'i tshul dag ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:420b-14: lag pa g-yon par thod pa thogs nas /
T02D1660:420b-15: mchan khung g-yon par kha tv'am ga se ral khar bsnams pa /
T02D1660:420b-16: g-yas par ba dan gsum pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa bzung ba'o //
T02D1660:420b-17: bud med la sogs rin chen mchog / ces pa
T02D1660:420b-18: btsun mo rin po che la sogs pa rin po
T02D1660:420b-19: che sna bdun sprul nas longs spyod pa'o //
T02D1660:420b-20: dbang po drag po nye dbang bsad //
T02D1660:420b-22: phyogs skyong thams cad bsad nas za bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D1660:420b-23: dbang po gcig phu dang zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa gnyis ka'i thun mong gi gar gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:420b-24: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1660:420b-25: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:420b-26: lag pa gnyis kyis gar byed cing sems dpa'i phyed
T02D1660:420b-27: krung dang langs pas drag po la sogs pa'i bdud
T02D1660:420b-28: thams cad dbang du byas shing longs spyad nas gsol
T02D1660:420b-30: de nyid kyi sbyor ba yis zhes pa la sogs
T02D1660:420b-31: pa skyil krung phyed pa'i gar bshig nas g-yas brkyang
T02D1660:420b-32: byas te / bskal pa bzang po'i lha mo rnams
T02D1660:420b-33: kyi bud med kun la longs spyod pa yin no
T02D1660:420b-34: byas te / // rkang pa g-yas pa'i mthe bo
T02D1660:420b-35: sa la btsugs nas g-yon pa brla'i steng du bzhag
T02D1660:420b-36: nas rab tu brkyang ba ste /
T02D1660:420b-37: bskyod pa dang btang ba ni byang chub sems bzlog pa ste /
T02D1660:420b-39: lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu ma de dag nyid
T02D1660:420b-40: kyis lha dang mi rnams la longs spyod pa yin
T02D1660:421a-1: he ru ka'i dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya chen po bstan to //
T02D1660:421a-2: de'i 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:421a-3: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1660:421a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:421a-5: dpal ldan he ru ka dbab pa /
T02D1660:421a-7: tshogs 'khor ram gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la ye shes phab nas /
T02D1660:421a-8: gdul bya ji ltar mos pa'i sgyu ma sna tshogs gnas pa yin no //
T02D1660:421a-12: rmongs pa ni phra mo h'a'o //
T02D1660:421a-13: dga' ba ni be t'a l'i'o //
T02D1660:421a-14: gar byed sgyur ba ni pukka s'i'o //
T02D1660:421a-16: shi ba bshad pa ni ghasma r'i'i'o //
T02D1660:421a-17: bde ba'i phyag rgyas gnas pa ni do bi n'i'i'o //
T02D1660:421a-18: gzhan yang zhi ba'i mig dang ldan pa ni goo r'i'i 'o //
T02D1660:421a-19: drag po'i mig dang ldan pa ni coo r'i'i'o //
T02D1660:421a-20: rmongs pa'i mig dang ldan pa ni be t'a l'i'i'o //
T02D1660:421a-21: gyen du lta ba ni pukka s'i'i 'o //
T02D1660:421a-22: chags pa'i lta ba ni pra mo h'a'i'o //
T02D1660:421a-23: gar byed pas lta ba ni tsanda l'i'i'o //
T02D1660:421a-24: khro bo'i lta ba ni ghasma r'i'i'o //
T02D1660:421a-25: byams pa'i lta ba ni dngos grub mchog ster tom bi n'i'i'o //
T02D1660:421a-34: grub pas 'khyud pa ni dom bi n'i'i'o //
T02D1660:421a-35: de rnams kyi sems kyi phyag rgya bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:421a-36: rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis //
T02D1660:421a-37: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:421a-38: rtse gcig pas bde ba rgyas 'debs pa ni goo r'i ste dang po'i'o //
T02D1660:421a-39: lag pa gnyis mngon par bstod nas se gol brdabs
T02D1660:421a-40: shing dbugs gyen du 'byin pas g-yon du lta zhing
T02D1660:421a-41: lag pa snying 'dren pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T02D1660:421a-42: 'o byed pas 'khyud cing gar byed pas rmongs pa ni gsum pa'o //
T02D1660:421a-43: bsgrub bya za ba'i bsam pas lus 'degs pa ni bzhi pa'o //
T02D1660:421a-44: tshangs pa'i mgo bo'i nang du bdud rtsi rnams 'jig
T02D1660:421a-45: rten gsum las rgyal ba'i gar byed pa ni lnga'o
T02D1660:421a-46: // de bzhin sa las 'dren pas snying phug nas
T02D1660:421a-47: rang gi phyag rgya tshul du ston pa ni bdun
T02D1660:421a-49: klu'i dkyil 'khor gyi bsgrub par bya ba'i zhal du gsol ba ni za ba mo'i'o //
T02D1660:421b-0: rab tu 'jigs pa'i mes @421b bsreg pa ni he ru ka dang dom bi n'i'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1660:421b-1: de nas phyag rgya'i lan gyis dngos grub sgrub pa'i lan bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:421b-2: de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyis //
T02D1660:421b-3: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:421b-4: dngos grub sgrub pa'i dus su slob dpon gyis goo

T02D1660:421b-6: n'i'i phyag rgya'o ; / slob dpon gyis tsoo r'i slob mas ghasma r'i /
T02D1660:421b-7: slob dpon gyis phra mo h'a /
T02D1660:421b-9: slob dpon gyis be t'a l'i /
T02D1660:421b-10: slob mas pukka s'i'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1660:421b-11: de ltar gar dang gar gyi lan phyag rgya'i mtshan
T02D1660:421b-12: nyid nyon mongs 'joms pa'i bdag nyid phyag rgya'i khyad
T02D1660:421b-14: dpal ldan rdo rje padmo slong //
T02D1660:421b-16: dang po lag pa gnyis padmo kha bye ba lta bu'i phyag rgya byas pas rgyas btab pa dang /
T02D1660:421b-19: thal bar bsgrub pa dang 'tsho bar byed pa'o //
T02D1660:421b-20: las lnga phyag rgya'i lan brgyad kyis sgrub par byed pa yin no //
T02D1660:421b-21: de ltar las kyi phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02D1660:421b-22: he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi glu bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:421b-23: de nas phyag rgya shes pa'i zhes pa nas /
T02D1660:421b-24: khyad par du ni bshad par bya //
T02D1660:421b-25: zhes pa'i bar gyis dam bca' ba bstan to //
T02D1660:421b-26: gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhes pa nas /
T02D1660:421b-27: gsal bar mdzod ces pa'i bar gyis he ru ka'i dngos grub len pa'i glu gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:421b-28: glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis //
T02D1660:421b-29: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis phan yon bstan to //
T02D1660:421b-30: he ru ka'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub len pa'i glu gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:421b-31: da ni padma gar dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:421b-32: rnal 'byor de nyid bha ga w'an //
T02D1660:421b-33: zhes pa nas phyag rgya'o zhes pa'i bar gyis padma gar dbang gi phyag rgya chen po gsungs so //
T02D1660:421b-34: g-yas pa g-yon pa sbyor ba yis //
T02D1660:421b-35: zhes pa rkang pa'i phyag rgya bstan to //
T02D1660:421b-36: 'khor gyi lha mo'i phyag rgya ni /
T02D1660:421b-37: snyems pa'i lag pa g-yon pa yis //
T02D1660:421b-38: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:421b-39: g-yon pa snyems pas padma bzung nas g-yas pas kha 'byed pa rnam par gzigs ma'i'o //
T02D1660:421b-40: g-yon pa snyems pas padma rnon po bzung nas g-yas pa snying gar 'dren pa sgrol ma'i'o //
T02D1660:421b-41: g-yon snyems pas padma bzung nas g-yas pas sa'i 'khor lo bskor ba ni sa 'dzin ma'i'o //
T02D1660:422a-1: pa snyems pas padma'i thang ka bzung nas g-yas pa
T02D1660:422a-2: ba dan gsum pa gar byed pa khro gnyer ma'i'o
T02D1660:422a-3: // g-yon pa snyems pas padma ser po ci bder
T02D1660:422a-4: bzung bas g-yas pa chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs
T02D1660:422a-5: nas 'dzin pa gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma'i'o //
T02D1660:422a-6: g-yon pa padma dmar po bzung nas g-yas pas snying gar 'dren pa sna tshogs padma'i'o //
T02D1660:422a-7: sna tshogs padma'am padma dmar skya 'dzin pa padma nas za ma'i'o //
T02D1660:422a-8: padma dkar sngo g-yon pas bzung nas g-yas pas snying gar 'byed pa rdo rje dbang phyug ma'i'o //
T02D1660:422a-9: de ltar las kyi phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02D1660:422a-10: sku'i phyag rgya chen po bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:422a-11: rnam dag gzigs ma zhes pa nas /
T02D1660:422a-12: lha mo chen mo rnams so zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02D1660:422a-13: phyag rgya bshad nas dngos grub len pa'i glu bshad par dam bca' ba ni /
T02D1660:422a-14: de nas phyag rgya zhes pa shloka gcig gis gsungs so //
T02D1660:422a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis so //

T02D1660:422a-18: gi dngos grub len pa'i glu gsungs pa yin no

T02D1660:422a-23: mnyam sbyor de nyid bha ga w'an //
T02D1660:422a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T02D1660:422a-25: shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la //
T02D1660:422a-26: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te //
T02D1660:422a-28: rdo rje nyi ma cung zhig khro bo'i nyams dang bcas pa /
T02D1660:422a-31: khro bo'i tshul dang gzi brjid chen po ston pa lha'i nyi ma'i gzugs can no //
T02D1660:422a-33: rdo rje pus mo gnyis bcings nas //
T02D1660:422a-34: zhes pa shloka gcig gis rkang pa'i phyag rgya bstan to //
T02D1660:422a-35: gtso bo bstan nas 'khor gyi ni dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1660:422a-36: gter dag dang zhes pa la sogs te /
T02D1660:422a-41: mchod tshe zhes bya bas mda' 'dzin ma la sogs pa gcig dang /
T02D1660:422a-42: gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1660:422b-0: me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi @422b dang ;
T02D1660:422b-1: bcu gnyis mchod pa che zhes bya'o //
T02D1660:422b-2: ji lta'i tshul du ston pa dag / ces bya
T02D1660:422b-3: bas rta gdong ma la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi gsungs
T02D1660:422b-4: so // phyag rgya bshad nas glu bshad pa ni /

T02D1660:422b-6: khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid ces pa nas thams
T02D1660:422b-7: cad 'gro zhes pa'i bar gyis dngos grub len pa'i
T02D1660:422b-8: glu gsungs so // glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis //
T02D1660:422b-9: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis phan yon gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1660:422b-10: rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02D1660:422b-11: rta mchog gi phyag rgya gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:422b-13: rdo rje slong ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes
T02D1660:422b-14: pa'i bar gyis sku phyag rgya chen po bstan to
T02D1660:422b-15: // de yi rkang pa'i phyag rgya ni //

T02D1660:422b-17: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //

T02D1660:422b-21: de ltar phyag rgya bshad nas dngos grub kyi glu gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:422b-22: de nas phyag rgya ni zhes pa 'di shloka gcig gis dam bca' ba gsungs so //
T02D1660:422b-23: myos byed stong pa zhes pa tshig rkang gcig gis dbang gi sku bstan to //
T02D1660:422b-24: stod ni gshin rje stong pas zhes pa'i tshig rkang gcig gis mngon spyod kyi sku bstan to //
T02D1660:422b-25: tshangs pa stong las zhes pa'i tshig rkang gcig gis zhi ba'i sku bstan to //
T02D1660:422b-26: dkyil 'khor zhes pa'i tshig rkang gcig gis rgyas pa'i sku bstan to //
T02D1660:422b-27: de bstan nas ci mdzad ce na /
T02D1660:422b-28: phrin las bzhi mdzad pa yin te /
T02D1660:422b-29: thams cad rnam par dag par mos pa'i gdul bya bzhi la /
T02D1660:422b-30: ngo mthon stobs kyis mnan nas yi ge hi bzhis mngon sum gyi lam bstan to //

T02D1660:422b-32: shig zhig pas lha bzhi pa brgyal du bcug pa
T02D1660:422b-33: yin no // de yang hu lu hu lu'i sgras

T02D1660:422b-36: mnan nas dpal mo phrogs so //
T02D1660:422b-37: sma na ta'i sgras tshangs pa mnan nas dbang mo
T02D1660:422b-38: phrogs pa dang 'dod lha mnan nas dga' ba mo
T02D1660:423a-1: rta mchog gi phrin las bzhi bstan pa nas /

T02D1660:423a-3: ma 'ongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgor spyad pa spyod
T02D1660:423a-4: pa rnams kyang khro zhing gtum pa'i stobs kyis bdag
T02D1660:423a-5: po rnams mnan nas lha mo rnams dang sbyor ba'i
T02D1660:423a-6: tshe aa la la ho zhes gsungs pa yin no
T02D1660:423a-7: // rjes 'jug rnal 'byor bas bdag po bzhi brgyal
T02D1660:423a-8: du bzhugs pa'i sngags ni aom sam bha ni zhes
T02D1660:423a-9: pa nas h'um phat ces pa'i bar gyis gsungs so

T02D1660:423a-12: mdza' bo mi la bya'am mi bya ba //
T02D1660:423a-13: de dag yongs su rtog pa med kyang sla //
T02D1660:423a-14: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:423a-15: rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral bas gzung 'dzin med pa'i ye shes skyes pa na /
T02D1660:423a-16: sgyu ma lta bur nges pas mdza' ba dang /
T02D1660:423a-17: mi mdza' ba su zhig kyang med do //
T02D1660:423a-18: de zhin du rgol ba rnams sgyu ma lta bur
T02D1660:423a-19: shes nas dgra bo bya ba su yang med do
T02D1660:423a-20: // glu 'di blangs pa'i zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis phan yon bstan to //

T02D1660:423a-23: 'dzum mo mthe bo mnan nas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:423a-24: rdo rje thal mo sbyar la /

T02D1660:423a-26: la gung mo'i rtse mo ni dpal grub pa'i spyan

T02D1660:423a-31: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:423a-32: rdo rje thal mo gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste /

T02D1660:423a-35: rdo rje thal mo gyen du phye nas /
T02D1660:423a-36: mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo bkug la mthe bong gnyis kyis mnan te /
T02D1660:423a-38: dpal mo zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin ma phrogs nas 'ongs te /

T02D1660:423b-0: tshul du @423b ni rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1660:423b-2: rdo rje thal mo mnyam par sbyar la /
T02D1660:423b-4: mthe bos bkab pa ni dpal gyi nor bu zhes bya'o //

T02D1660:423b-6: rdo rje thal mo sbyar la /
T02D1660:423b-7: mthe chung dang srin lag gzhi bas nas brkyang la

T02D1660:423b-13: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bzung nas bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i tshul
