T02D1660:433b-0: ldum chags @433b lcug mas kha brgyan la /
T02D1660:433b-1: rnam rgyal gyi bum pa la gtso bo bkod la sngags 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1660:433b-2: de nas bdag gam gzhan la mngon shes bskyed par
T02D1660:433b-3: 'dod pa de la rnam rgyal gyi chus dbang bskur
T02D1660:433b-4: zhing bsrung ba byas la dkyil 'khor de'i thog tu
T02D1660:433b-5: lha gang yin pa de'i yi ge la reg tu
T02D1660:433b-6: gzhug par bya'o // de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang /
T02D1660:433b-7: bden pa chen po'i byin rlabs dang /
T02D1660:433b-8: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i bden pa dang /
T02D1660:433b-9: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1660:433b-10: ston par gyur cig ces byas la reg par gzhug
T02D1660:433b-11: go // de bzhin du ma reg par me tog dor ba'am /
T02D1660:433b-13: me rong dam shing leb bam /
T02D1660:433b-14: chu dang ba dang ba chu'am /
T02D1660:433b-16: gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i khyim 'jam po dag la mig byin gyis brlabs la bltar gzhug go //
T02D1660:433b-17: rna ba byin gyis brlabs la nyan du gzhug go//
T02D1660:433b-18: sems byin gyis brlabs la gzhan gyi sems brtag par bya'o /
T02D1660:433b-19: 'gro ba'i rigs bzhi'i 'khor lo snying gar bkod la 'chi 'pho dang skye ba brtag par bya'o //
T02D1660:433b-20: zad par dang zil gnon bsgoms la rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1660:433b-21: des 'jig rten gyi bya ba blang bya dor bya dang /
T02D1660:433b-24: chom pos 'phrogs pa dang ma 'phrogs pa /
T02D1660:433b-25: rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa /
T02D1660:433b-27: don yod pa dang med pa /
T02D1660:433b-28: grub pa dang mi grub pa /
T02D1660:433b-29: bde ba dang mi bde ba /
T02D1660:433b-32: sangs rgyas kyi don thams cad kyang 'khrul 'khor gyi
T02D1660:433b-33: stobs kyis mngon shes lnga bskyed nas sems can gyi
T02D1660:433b-34: don byed do // rdo rje sems dpa'i mngon shes
T02D1660:433b-35: bskyed nas rnam snang gi rnal 'byor pas sa chu
T02D1660:433b-36: me rlung nam mkha' la mngon shes bskyed par bya'o
T02D1660:433b-37: don byed do // // he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pas 'dod yon thams cad la bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1660:433b-38: rta mchog gi rnal 'byor pas reg pa'am ma reg
T02D1660:433b-39: pa la sogs pa pra dbab pa'i yul bcu la
T02D1660:433b-40: snga ma ltar mngon shes bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1660:433b-41: de ltar ji snyed mkhyen pa'i rnam shes kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad nas /
T02D1660:434a-0: da ni lha'i bu'i bdud 'joms pa'i @434a * //
T02D1660:434a-1: bsrung ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad par bya ste /
T02D1660:434a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal 'byor ba /
T02D1660:434a-3: ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs ldan pas rdul tshon slob dpon bsnyen sgrub bzhis lhar bskyed pa'am /
T02D1660:434a-4: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i slob dpon cha byad dang /
T02D1660:434a-6: dur khrod du ro bsregs pa'i thal ba'am /
T02D1660:434a-7: ma mo'i gnas su keng rus yun ring po lon
T02D1660:434a-8: pa'i phye ma bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pas bsgrub
T02D1660:434a-9: pa'i dpral bar thig le bya ba'am /
T02D1660:434a-10: yang na snying ga lkog ma dpral ba gsum du
T02D1660:434a-11: sor mo gsum pa'i ri mo byas pa bdag dang
T02D1660:434a-14: des phyogs bzhi dang mtshams bzhi dang nam mkha' dang sa la gtor na bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:434a-15: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor lnga yang bsrung ba de nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D1660:434a-16: thal ba de ji lta bu yin snyam na /
T02D1660:434a-17: bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pa'i thal ba la bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02D1660:434a-20: 'phar ba la sogs pa'i rtags byung nas bsrung ba'i
T02D1660:434a-21: rdo rje thal ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i bsrung
T02D1660:434a-22: ba'o // rigs bzhi'i thal ba'i bsrung ba bshad nas /
T02D1660:434a-23: chu'i bsrung ba bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:434a-24: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02D1660:434a-25: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te bsgom pa gdong
T02D1660:434a-26: rgyan gyon pa'i lha bzhi'i rgya mtsho'am 'bab chu'i 'gram
T02D1660:434a-27: du chu la dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas /
T02D1660:434a-28: chu gyen du 'gro ba dang mi g-yo ba mthong ba de'i tshe /
T02D1660:434a-29: lha thams cad zhu ba'i lha rdzas kyi zhi ba'i
T02D1660:434a-30: chu'i mchog gis bdag dang gzhan la gtor ba dang
T02D1660:434a-31: / spyi bor blugs pa dang khrus bya ba dang /
T02D1660:434a-32: chu der 'bogs shing rgal nas bcud kyi 'jig rten bsrung ba dang /
T02D1660:434a-33: snod kyi 'jig rten kyang snga ma bzhin du bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:434a-34: rigs bzhi'i chu'i bsrung ba bshad nas /
T02D1660:434a-35: yungs kar bskyed nas bsrung ba ni /
T02D1660:434a-36: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02D1660:434a-37: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:434a-39: lha rnams kyi cha byad gyon pa bskyed pa nas
T02D1660:434a-40: mi'i thod pa dur khrod kyi sas bkang pa la
T02D1660:434a-41: sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags kyis gzugs dang /
T02D1660:434a-42: m'a ma k'i'i sngags kyis bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chu blugs pa dang /
T02D1660:434a-43: gos dkar mo'i sngags kyis yur ma bya ba dang /
T02D1660:434a-44: sgrol ba'i sngags kyis bsrung ba byas la /
T02D1660:434b-0: smin pa'i tshe dmangs @434b rigs kyi bu mo'i lag par sprul nas /
T02D1660:434b-1: lus sam mgul du gdags pa dang /
T02D1660:434b-2: lo mas tshod ma bya zhing yungs mar gyis mgo la bsku ba dang /
T02D1660:434b-3: phyogs mtshams kyang snga ma bzhin bsrung ba bya'o //
T02D1660:434b-4: de ltar rigs rnams kyi yungs kar gyi bsrung ba bshad nas /
T02D1660:434b-5: rigs rnams kyi lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bsrung ba bshad pa ni //
T02D1660:434b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02D1660:434b-7: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:434b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas mig
T02D1660:434b-9: tu ma dang ta las nyi zla bskyed la mig
T02D1660:434b-10: 'bras la h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bskyed
T02D1660:434b-11: de / glog lta bu'i rdo rje phra mo'i 'od
T02D1660:434b-12: zer gyis nam mkha'i khams gang bar smra bar bya'o
T02D1660:434b-13: de / // rdo rje phra mo'i mthong ba mtshan
T02D1660:434b-14: ma thob pa'i tshe ma mchu sos mnan la rdo
T02D1660:434b-15: rje dril bu bzung nas g-yon du 'gyings pa dang
T02D1660:434b-16: bcas pa'i rdo rje'i 'gros kyis 'gro zhing gsal ba'i
T02D1660:434b-17: lta bas phyogs bcur bskor zhing /
T02D1660:434b-18: steng 'og byin gyis brlabs la sa 'og sa bla sa stengs gsum rgyas 'debs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:434b-19: de bzhin du gdul bya dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i
T02D1660:434b-20: rkang ba'i rang bzhin ngan pa rnams kyang snod du
T02D1660:434b-21: 'gyur ro // de bzhin du dkyil 'khor bzhi la yang shes par bya'o //
T02D1660:434b-22: thun mong gi phyag rgya gsungs nas bye brag gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:434b-23: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02D1660:434b-25: bud med bcu bzhi lha mo'i cha byad du byas
T02D1660:434b-26: la de'i dbus su bar ti nas 'byung ba bzhin
T02D1660:434b-27: du bdag kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i cha byad du
T02D1660:434b-28: byas nas bsnyen sgrub bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D1660:434b-29: bsgoms te / lha mo'i phyag rgya lta ba 'dug
T02D1660:434b-30: stangs dang phyag rgya'i gar dang sngags zlos shing che
T02D1660:434b-31: ge mo raksha raksha byas nas bdag dang gzhan phyogs
T02D1660:434b-32: bcing ba la sogs pa bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:434b-33: rnam snang gi rnal 'byor pas rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor gyi kha'i cha byad byas /
T02D1660:434b-34: bud med bcu bdun gyis bar ti nas 'byung ba ltar lha'i cha byad byas nas lta ba dang /
T02D1660:434b-35: lag pa rkang pa sngags 'don pa dang bcas pas snga ma ltar bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:434b-37: he ru ka'i rnam par 'phrul pas bar ti nas 'byung ba bzhin byas na bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:434b-38: padma gar dbang gi rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1660:434b-39: ji lta ba'i gzugs dang dbyibs dang zhing padma kha
T02D1660:434b-40: 'byed pas bar ti nas 'byung ba ltar cha byad
T02D1660:434b-41: byas nas snga ma bzhin du bsrung bar 'gyur ro
T02D1660:435a-0: // @435a * // rdo rje nyi ma'i rnal 'byor pas 'bar ba'i rdo rje lta ba'i tshul bzhin bzhugs /
T02D1660:435a-1: rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i cha byad
T02D1660:435a-2: par ti ltar byas nas snga ma ltar bsrung bar
T02D1660:435a-3: 'gyur ro // rta mchog gi rnal 'byor pas ji
T02D1660:435a-4: lta ba'i rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul bzhin
T02D1660:435a-5: byas la rta mchog gi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas
T02D1660:435a-6: dbang bskur te ham kham las go cha bskyed de
T02D1660:435a-7: 'gyur ro // / snying gar mdud pa lan gsum
T02D1660:435a-8: nu ma dang lkog mar lan gnyis gnyis mdud la
T02D1660:435a-10: lan cig rna ba gnyis kyi ltag par ze ka
T02D1660:435a-11: bcings nas lhag ma sbyangs pa ni go cha'i tshul
T02D1660:435a-12: du zhes bya'o // de nas spyi bo dang dpral
T02D1660:435a-13: ba dang glo g-yas g-yon dang rgyab tu rdo rje
T02D1660:435a-14: phreng ba bcings la dar 'ching ba bzhin du phreng
T02D1660:435a-15: ba yang bcings nas bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba dang
T02D1660:435a-17: de ltar dngos grub len pa'i bsrung ba'i phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02D1660:435a-18: da ni nad zhi bar byas nas tshe 'phel ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad pa ni //
T02D1660:435a-19: ches sems dpa' yi tshul ston cing //
T02D1660:435a-20: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:435a-21: bsnyen sgrub gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i bskur bskyed la /
T02D1660:435a-22: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la nad pa'i lus
T02D1660:435a-23: las rims mig gsum pa lag pa gsum pa rkang
T02D1660:435a-24: pa gsum pa kha dog nag pa ste ;
T02D1660:435a-26: sprul pa dang sdig pa la sogs pa'i gzugs bsams te /
T02D1660:435a-27: khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi phyag rgya bcings la mdzub
T02D1660:435a-28: mo lcags kyur byas pas nad dang dug bsal ba
T02D1660:435a-29: de nyid smin mtshams su bzhag na bsrung bar 'gyur
T02D1660:435a-30: ro // rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis
T02D1660:435a-31: kyi rtse mo bkug la sbrum ma'i gsum pa la
T02D1660:435a-35: dmu rdzing la sogs pa la btsugs nas sngags 'bum
T02D1660:435a-36: phrag gcig bzlas na zug rngu sos par 'gyur ro
T02D1660:435a-37: // mig gso ba ni dpal grub pa'i spyan zhes
T02D1660:435a-38: bya ba mdzub mo mthe bo'i rtsa bar bkug nas
T02D1660:435a-39: mthe bong dang gung mo rtse sbyar ba ni dpal
T02D1660:435a-40: grub pa'i spyan zhes bya ste /
T02D1660:435a-41: sngags 'bum bzlas nas mig phyis na long bas mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:435a-42: klad nad gso ba ni bdag nyid lha rnams kyi sbyor ba dang /
T02D1660:435a-46: padma'i dang rin po che dang /
T02D1660:435b-0: las kyi khu tshur @435b gyis glad pa'i nad drangs
T02D1660:435b-1: nas kha'i phyogs su byung ba ltar byas na klad
T02D1660:435b-3: rna ba gso ba ni h'um las rdo rje rtse
T02D1660:435b-4: lnga pa dkar po gnyis rna ba bskyed la bdag
T02D1660:435b-5: nyid kyi lce la rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar
T02D1660:435b-6: po bsams la de rna ba ta th'a ga ta
T02D1660:435b-7: h'um zhes 'bum bzlas la rna bar phus gdab par
T02D1660:435b-8: bya'o// byis pa gso ba ni /
T02D1660:435b-9: rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis brkyang la
T02D1660:435b-10: mthe bo mthe chung so sor brkyang nas lag pa
T02D1660:435b-11: g-yas pa'i gung mo byis pa'i spyi bor bzhag nas
T02D1660:435b-12: su mbhas gtsug tor bcings na byis pa'i nad sos
T02D1660:435b-13: par 'gyur ro // dug gso ba ni lag pa
T02D1660:435b-14: g-yas pa'i mthil du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1660:435b-15: par 'gyur ro // bsams la / de las byung
T02D1660:435b-16: ba'i sor mo lnga sprul mgo'i gdengs ka bsams nas
T02D1660:435b-17: sgrub pa'i rkang par yam las rlung /
T02D1660:435b-19: de'i steng du ra nag po la zhon pa'i skyes
T02D1660:435b-20: bu'i gzugs can nag po bsams nas me 'bar bas
T02D1660:435b-21: bsregs pa dang / dug bkug nas gdul ba dang /
T02D1660:435b-22: dug 'od zer gyi lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang mi lhas zos par bsams la /
T02D1660:435b-23: gdug pa'i mche ba la sogs pas zin pa'i 'dug
T02D1660:435b-24: stangs stag dang gos kyi dgon zan gyi dug ste
T02D1660:435b-25: brtson pa rnams sos par 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:435b-27: khro bo'i sdigs mdzub kyis g-yas pa'i mthe bo dang /
T02D1660:435b-28: gung mo gnyis mig lta bur byas nas g-yon pa'i
T02D1660:435b-29: khro bo'i khu tshur gyis yang de bzhin du byas
T02D1660:435b-30: te / g-yas g-yon gyi gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i rgyab sbyar te /
T02D1660:435b-31: mthe bo dang mdzub mo so sor bcad pas mdzub mo dang gung mo bar du gru gsum dang /
T02D1660:435b-32: gung mo gnyis mthe bo'i tshigs dang por bzhag pas
T02D1660:435b-33: mdzub mo gung mo mthe bo gnyis kyi bar gru
T02D1660:435b-34: bzhi byas nas zhi rgyas mngon spyod kyi phyag rgya
T02D1660:435b-35: bcings la gdon dang dug sel bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:435b-36: shi ba slong ba'i phyag rgya ni he ru ka'i
T02D1660:435b-37: phyag rgya 'dzin byas la ba dan gsum pa gnyis
T02D1660:435b-38: bcings te / nang zlog pa gung mo gnyis mdud nas /
T02D1660:435b-40: mthe chung gnyis so sor mdud de /
T02D1660:435b-43: g-yas pa'i mthe bong rtse mo sbyor bas rtse mo
T02D1660:435b-44: lnga pa zhes bya ba smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu
T02D1660:435b-45: ru bzhag pas ma mo thams cad 'dul ba dang
T02D1660:436a-2: rmongs pa dang thal bar byas pas slar 'tsho bar byed do //
T02D1660:436a-3: rta gso ba'i mu dra ni /
T02D1660:436a-4: tram las rta rnams bskyed la /
T02D1660:436a-5: hr'i las stan padmar bskyed la /
T02D1660:436a-6: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02D1660:436a-7: h'um las rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'am rta mchog
T02D1660:436a-8: tu bskyed na nad med cing nyams skye bar 'gyur
T02D1660:436a-9: ro // glang po gso ba ni /
T02D1660:436a-10: h'um ga h'um zhes pa las glang po bskyed la padma'i gdan dang zla ba'i gdan bskyed de /
T02D1660:436a-11: rigs bzhi'i lha bskyed nas bdud rtsi 'dzag par bsams na glang po'i nyams stobs 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1660:436a-13: hri mam hri zhes pas bya bskyed la shr'i badzra
T02D1660:436a-14: satva stvam aa gi ho zhes pas rna bar bzlas
T02D1660:436a-15: na nad med pa dang mi skad smra bar 'gyur
T02D1660:436a-16: ro // ljon shing bskyed pa ni rdo rje sems
T02D1660:436a-17: dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs bzhi'i rnal 'byor byas la
T02D1660:436a-18: h'um mam h'um zhes pa las skar ma rgyal gza'
T02D1660:436a-19: phur bu'i zhing thams cad sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags
T02D1660:436a-20: ro // kyis bskyed la / m'a ma k'i'i sngags kyis bcu ba dang /
T02D1660:436a-21: sgrol ma'i sngags kyis bsrung ba dang /
T02D1660:436a-22: gos dkar mo'i sngags kyis yur ma bya ba dang /
T02D1660:436a-23: gnod mdzes la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bsrungs na nad
T02D1660:436a-24: med cing me tog dang 'bras bu 'phel bar 'gyur
T02D1660:436a-25: ro // de ltar gso ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes
T02D1660:436a-26: kyi byin gyis brlabs nas mtshon cha'i phyag rgya'i ye
T02D1660:436a-28: 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phangs ma 'phangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:436a-31: lag pas 'phangs pa ni 'khor lo 'phangs nas slar bzung ba ni mda' mdung dang zhags pa'o //
T02D1660:436a-33: de nyid rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:436a-34: dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dag / ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:436a-35: de la 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D1660:436a-40: de dag gi bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:436a-41: rkang pa gshibs nas mnyam pa'i stang stabs bya ba dang /
T02D1660:436a-42: rkang pa 'gyes pas sa ga bya ba dang /
T02D1660:436a-43: dkyil 'khor de dag kyang zhes pa zlum pos sa gnon dang /
T02D1660:436a-44: brkyang bskum gyis kyang zhes g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum pa'o //
T02D1660:436a-45: g-yas brkyang ni dbyibs kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1660:436a-46: de la bde blag gi rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:436b-0: @436b dpung pa g-yon pa mi lhod par bsgoms pa dang /
T02D1660:436b-1: 'ben la gtad na sran gzugs pa dang /
T02D1660:436b-2: lag pa g-yas pa bskum pas brten pa dang /
T02D1660:436b-3: rna ltag tu 'phen pas yan lag brten pa ste /
T02D1660:436b-4: 'di ni lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can //
T02D1660:436b-5: zhes bya ste lhag ma ni phan yon no //
T02D1660:436b-6: de la sbyor ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:436b-7: rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul du //
T02D1660:436b-8: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis kun du sbyor ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:436b-9: lag pa g-yon pa legs bsrang pa //
T02D1660:436b-10: zhes pa shlo ka gcig gis 'dren pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o //
T02D1660:436b-11: rna drung bar du zlum por ni //
T02D1660:436b-12: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis 'gengs pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:436b-13: ji ltar rig pa drangs nas ni //
T02D1660:436b-14: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis myur ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:436b-17: 'phen pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:436b-18: de gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1660:436b-19: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1660:436b-20: g-yas phyogs mda' bskor nas 'gengs nas sa la smad pa dang 'ben nam sa la gtod pa dang /
T02D1660:436b-21: rkang pa g-yon pa'i pus mo bkug g-yas pa'i brang bas sa la btsugs pa ni /
T02D1660:436b-23: 'bigs pa bcu yi rgyal mchog gis //
T02D1660:436b-24: zhes pa g-yas pa'i sor mo sangs rgyas lngar bskyed de /
T02D1660:436b-25: phyag rgya'i mchog des phung po lnga dang /
T02D1660:436b-26: dbang po lnga la mda' phog par bsam mo //
T02D1660:436b-27: gsal ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:436b-28: mtshon cha lnga po thun mong gi cho ga bstan pa yin te /
T02D1660:436b-30: mnyam pa dang rab tu 'phangs pa la sogs pa lnga thabs kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1660:436b-31: nyam nga la gams dang bde sogs //
T02D1660:436b-32: zhes pa ni zlos pa'i phyag rgyal dang ;
T02D1660:436b-34: zhes pa phreng ba'i phyag rgya lnga dang /
T02D1660:436b-35: kun du kun nas thams cad du //
T02D1660:436b-36: zhes pa rus pa la sogs pa phyag rgya lnga dang /
T02D1660:436b-37: nyi shu ni dgra cha thams cad gsal bar rtog pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1660:436b-38: mtshon cha de rnams ni dngos grub len pa'i tshe
T02D1660:436b-39: mdun gyi lha dang bar chad kyi bdud la 'phen
T02D1660:436b-40: pa dang / phrin las byed pa'i tshe g-yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1660:436b-41: de ltar mtshon cha'i phyag rgya bstan nas las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:436b-42: srin lag gnyis kyi nang du ni //
T02D1660:436b-43: zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje khu tshur dang /
T02D1660:437a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo'i padma'i rin @437a * //
T02D1660:437a-1: po che'i las kyi khu tshur rnams kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa dang /
T02D1660:437a-2: mtshan ma thob nas las rnams bya'o //
T02D1660:437a-3: de ltar lag pa'i mu dra'i ye shes bshad nas /
T02D1660:437a-4: dpal ldan rdo rje las kyi rkang pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:437a-5: rkang pa brkyang dang gnon pa dang //
T02D1660:437a-6: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:437a-7: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la dngos grub len pa dang /
T02D1660:437a-9: tshogs kyi 'khor lo spyod pa'i brtul zhugs byed pa'i
T02D1660:437a-10: tshig rkang pa brgyad pa g-yas kyi phyed krung dang
T02D1660:437a-11: / gnon pa g-yon gyi phyed krung bskums nas 'degs
T02D1660:437a-12: pa'i rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gzugs brnyan mnan
T02D1660:437a-13: nas skad phyung ba'i tshe bka' bsgo bar bya'o //
T02D1660:437a-14: de bzhin du rnam snang rnal 'byor pas dpal mnan pa rdo rje skyil mo krung dang /
T02D1660:437a-15: rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru kas g-yon brkyang pa dang /
T02D1660:437a-16: padma gar dbang gi padma'i skyil krung gis mnan pa dang /
T02D1660:437a-17: rdo rje nyi ma'i rin po che'i skyil krung gis mnan pa dang /
T02D1660:437a-18: rta mchig gi las kyi skyil mo krung gis mnan pa'o //
T02D1660:437a-19: mnan nas su dag longs spyod snyam nas /
T02D1660:437a-20: dbang phyug mnan nas dngos grub gsum ma bkug pa dang /
T02D1660:437a-21: khyab 'jug mnan nas dpa' mo bkug pa dang /
T02D1660:437a-22: tshangs pa mnan nas grol ma bkug pa dang /
T02D1660:437a-23: 'dod pa'i lha mnan nas dga' ma bkug pa dang /
T02D1660:437a-25: mkha' 'gro ma rnams longs spyad par bya'o //
T02D1660:437a-26: de bzhin du ku be ra mnan nas rig pa 'grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bkug pa dang /
T02D1660:437a-27: mi'i rgyal po mnan nas btsun mo bkug la longs spyad par bya'o //
T02D1660:437a-28: de ltar rkang pa'i phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02D1660:437a-29: sgrub pa'i yan lag sngags skyes zhing skyes ye shes
T02D1660:437a-30: las skyes pa kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod lam
T02D1660:437a-31: shes nas yan lag dang nyid lag gi brda bya
T02D1660:437a-32: ste / sgrub pa'i yan lag tu shes nas /
T02D1660:437a-33: dgug pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:437a-34: rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bcings //
T02D1660:437a-35: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1660:437a-36: thun mong gi phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02D1660:437a-37: bye brag tu rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo dgug pa ni /
T02D1660:437a-38: g-yon 'gying tshul shloka gcig gis so //
T02D1660:437a-39: rnam snang gi ni dpal ldan sna tshogs 'dzin zhes pa gcig go //
T02D1660:437a-41: g-yon pa'i dril bu sgra sgrogs shing //
T02D1660:437b-0: g-yon pa'i brla la gzhag ces @437b pa gcig go //
T02D1660:437b-2: bdag snying gar 'dren pa'i tshul du zhes pa gcig go //
T02D1660:437b-4: bdag gi snying gar 'dren tshul du zhes pa'i shloka gcig go //
T02D1660:437b-5: de ltar rtog pa dgu pa ni phyag rgya nyi
T02D1660:437b-6: shu rtsa brgyad kyi bsgrub pa'i yan lag nyi shu
T02D1660:437b-8: las dang po pa bsgrub pa'i tshe dang /
T02D1660:437b-9: mtshan ma thob pa'i tshe dang /
T02D1660:437b-10: (dpe gnyis la) mtshan ma thob pa'i tshe mchog tu
T02D1660:437b-11: gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa dngos grub len pa'i tshe
T02D1660:437b-12: dang / dngos grub thob pas ye shes la dbang
T02D1660:437b-13: pa'i rnal 'byor bas sems can gyi don du las
T02D1660:437b-14: rnams byed pa'i tshe dag cing rigs par yan lag
T02D1660:437b-18: // / de ltar brtag pa dgu bshad nas /
T02D1660:437b-19: da ni phyag rgya chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D1660:437b-20: rang bzhin la mos pa bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i
T02D1660:437b-21: rnal 'byor pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang mnyam par
T02D1660:437b-22: sbyor nas / mngon sum gyi lam bsgom pa bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:437b-23: de nas sna tshogs kun du ni lha drug tu bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa drug go //
T02D1660:437b-24: phyag rgya zhes pa'i sgrub pa 'di //
T02D1660:437b-25: zhes pa rigs drug phyag rgya bzhi'i bye brag go //
T02D1660:437b-26: kun du sna tshogs sbyor ba yis //
T02D1660:437b-27: zhes pa phyag rgya bzhi la dga' ba bzhi'i ye shes bskyed pa'o //
T02D1660:437b-28: kun du sna tshogs bshad par bya //
T02D1660:437b-29: zhes pa rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi la sbyor ba'o //
T02D1660:437b-30: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1660:437b-31: smin ma mig dang sna dang mchu //
T02D1660:437b-32: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:437b-33: rang dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya drug yum gyi smin
T02D1660:437b-34: ma dang mig dang so la sogs pa cha lugs
T02D1660:437b-35: su byas la phyag rgya thams cad kyis 'khyud pa
T02D1660:437b-36: dang / 'o bya ba la sogs pa rnam par smin pa bkrol nas rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
T02D1660:437b-37: rnam par smin pa bkrol nas mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
T02D1660:437b-38: de yang rnam par shes pa bsam gtan gyi ting
T02D1660:437b-39: nge 'dzin bskyed pa'i lha mo drug gi dbang du
T02D1660:437b-40: byas nas / rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i //
T02D1660:437b-41: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis dga' ba'i mtshan nyid bshad do //
T02D1660:437b-42: phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni //
T02D1660:437b-43: zhes pas mchog dga'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1660:437b-44: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1660:437b-45: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis lhan cig skyes dga'i lha mo'i mtshan nyid du bstan to //
T02D1660:437b-46: de ltar zhi gnas kyi bde ba bstan nas /
T02D1660:437b-47: lhag mthong gi bde ba bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:438a-2: zhes pa shloka gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba chen po 'od gsal ba bsgom pa'o //
T02D1660:438a-3: lta bas mi ngoms pa yi sku //
T02D1660:438a-4: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis rnam snang gi bde ba chen po bstan to //
T02D1660:438a-5: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs pa yi //
T02D1660:438a-6: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis he ru ka'i bde ba chen po bstan to //
T02D1660:438a-7: dbang po kun las byung ba yi //
T02D1660:438a-8: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis rdo rje nyi ma'i bde ba bstan to //
T02D1660:438a-9: dpal ldan yon tan 'gying dang bcas //
T02D1660:438a-10: zhes pa'i tshig rkang drug gis padma gar dbang gi bde ba chen po bstan to //
T02D1660:438a-11: gyen du 'phar ba'i dngos grub dang //
T02D1660:438a-12: zhes pa'i tshig rkang drug gis rta mchog gi bde ba chen po 'od gsal bstan to /
T02D1660:438a-13: lha mo rnams kyis ji ltar phyag rgya bya zhe na //
T02D1660:438a-14: kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po //
T02D1660:438a-15: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs tge /
T02D1660:438a-17: aa wa dh'u t'i kha sbyar na dpal rdo rje padmo gyen du 'phar ba'i spyan zhes bya ba /
T02D1660:438a-18: rigs bzhi'i srog aa wa dh'u t'ir 'jug ba'i thabs
T02D1660:438a-19: kyi phyag rgya drug la shes rab kyi phyag rgya
T02D1660:438a-20: drug gi lan du shes par bya'o //
T02D1660:438a-21: de ltar rtog pa bcu pa'i don bshad nas /
T02D1660:438a-23: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi //
T02D1660:438a-24: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:438a-25: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku dpag
T02D1660:438a-26: tu med pa dang ldan zhing nam mkha'i khams kyi
T02D1660:438a-27: mthas gtugs pa'i dus su bden pa'i tshig tu gsungs
T02D1660:438a-28: kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa mu
T02D1660:438a-29: med pa na rgyud sde bzhi'i rtog pa thams cad
T02D1660:438a-30: kyang / dang / rtogs pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyi rnam par rtog pa'i mthu dang /
T02D1660:438a-31: sgra'i rnam rtog gi yon tan de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1660:438a-32: thams cad kyis gang du yang gsung bar mi nus
T02D1660:438a-34: byin rlabs kyi lam gyi mthu dang /
T02D1660:438a-35: mngon sum lam gyi rang bzhin dag 'grub pa dang /
T02D1660:438a-36: sems 'od gsal chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu 'grub pa dang /
T02D1660:438a-37: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sa sor grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1660:438a-39: ci'i phyir gsung bar mi nus she na /
T02D1660:438a-40: 'di ni gsang ba mchog gi mchog //
T02D1660:438a-41: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:438a-42: don rang gi mtshan nyid ni sgra'i brjod bya ma
T02D1660:438a-43: yin pas mngon sum gyis nyams su myong ba'i don
T02D1660:438a-44: dga' ba ni gsang ba dang /
T02D1660:438a-46: lhan cig skyes dga' yin pas mchog gi dang /
T02D1660:438b-0: @438b bde ba chen po yin pas bde mchog go //
T02D1660:438b-1: sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la longs
T02D1660:438b-2: sku dang sprul skus ji ltar chos bstan zhe na
T02D1660:438b-3: / sems can don phyir lam rnams sbyong ba dang //
T02D1660:438b-4: rnam par dag pa rgyal bas yod mi mdzad //
T02D1660:438b-6: nyan thos ltar phung po lhag med kyi mya ngan
T02D1660:438b-7: las 'das par mi mdzad pas sangs rgyas rnams la
T02D1660:438b-8: ye shes kyi rnam pa dang /
T02D1660:438b-9: byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi sku'i rnam pa dang /
T02D1660:438b-10: las dang po pa'i so so'i skye bo la gsung gi rnam par snang ba yin no //
T02D1660:438b-11: don dam par mnyam par spyod pa'i don la gsum mi mnga'o //
T02D1660:438b-12: ci'i phyir mnyam par sbyor ba'i don la bar chad med pa yin zhe na /
T02D1660:438b-13: 'di la bgegs byed bdud kyang yod ma yin //
T02D1660:438b-15: dri ma dag pa dang ma dag pa ci'i phyir med snyam na /
T02D1660:438b-16: rtog pas mi 'grub brdar bas yod mi 'gyur //
T02D1660:438b-18: ci'i phyir glo bur dang 'dres pa ma yin zhe na /
T02D1660:438b-19: mi brtan pa dang bdud du nga mi 'gyur //
T02D1660:438b-21: rtsa ba'i chos kyi sku sems rang rig 'od gsal ci'i phyir mi ston zhe na /
T02D1660:438b-22: brtan pa'i phyir yang nga mi 'doms //
T02D1660:438b-24: don dam par mkhyen pa med kyang kun rdzob tu ji ltar lam rtogs she na /
T02D1660:438b-25: gang zhig rang gi bde bas bde grub pa //
T02D1660:438b-26: dngos grub mchog ni rten par mdzad //
T02D1660:438b-27: de ltar 'bras bu'i rgyud gsungs nas /
T02D1660:438b-28: rjes su yi rang bzhing bstod pa ni /
T02D1660:438b-29: sna tshogs zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1660:438b-30: sna tshogs pas de skad gsungs pa ni /
T02D1660:438b-31: rigs drug gi ston pa drug go //
T02D1660:438b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu dgyes //
T02D1660:438b-34: zhes pa nyan pa po'i sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rtag tu dgyes pa'o //
T02D1660:438b-35: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi ril gsungs pa zhes
T02D1660:438b-36: pa rigs drug gi gzugs kyi rtog pa bshad nas
T02D1660:438b-37: / sgra'i rnam par rtog pa drug ni /
T02D1660:438b-38: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1660:438b-39: rnam par rtog cing rab tu dgyes par 'gyur zhes
T02D1660:438b-40: pa gzugs kyi rnam rtog bsdus pa la bstod pa
T02D1660:438b-41: dang / sgra'i rnam rtog bshad zin pa la sogs bstod pa'o //
T02D1660:438b-42: 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i sngags pa gsangs sngags kyi spyad
T02D1660:438b-43: pa spyod pa rnams dkyil 'khor bsdus pa la bstod
T02D1660:438b-44: pa dang ches bshad pa'i rjes la rjes su yi
T02D1660:439a-1: rjes su yi rang bstod pa'i rjes la dbang po
T02D1660:439a-2: rnon po rnams kyis rtog pa bcu'i don cig car
T02D1660:439a-3: rtogs par bya'o zhes bstan pa ni /
T02D1660:439a-4: rnam mang rjes chags dga' bas mchod pa dang /
T02D1660:439a-5: zhes pa dga' ba gsum gyi zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1660:439a-6: rta mchog gi rnal 'byor bde bas gsal bar rjes su gsal bar mchod na ni /
T02D1660:439a-7: bde ba chen po grub par mngon sum du bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i don yin no //
T02D1660:439a-8: rab tu bde ba rnal 'byor dam pa skal bzangs
T02D1660:439a-9: dga' ba'i mchog / ces bya ba rang lhag par
T02D1660:439a-10: gnas pa'i rnal 'byor bas bde ba chen po cig
T02D1660:439a-11: car sgoms shig ces pa'i don to //
T02D1660:439a-12: rab mchog bde ba'i rang bzhin dam tshig rjes su grub par 'gyur //
T02D1660:439a-13: zhes pa bde ba chen po sku gsum thob par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do //
T02D1660:439a-14: de ltar cig car bsgom pa'i don bstan pa 'dis
T02D1660:439a-15: ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis nye bar
T02D1660:439a-16: bsdu ba byas pa'i rjes la /
T02D1660:439a-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar gyis zhes ba'o //
T02D1660:439a-18: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de skad gsungs
T02D1660:439a-19: so zhes pa lag na rod rje'i tshig yin no
T02D1660:439a-20: // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad ye shes kyi yul dang /
T02D1660:439a-21: mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyu rkyen gyi tshogs pa /
T02D1660:439a-22: mngon sum lam gyis sgyu ma yis //
T02D1660:439a-23: zag pa med pa bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba rtog pa bcu'i mtshan yin no //
T02D1660:439a-24: rtog pa bcu pa 'dis ni rtog pa thams cad
T02D1660:439a-25: kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba dbang bzhi
T02D1660:439a-26: pa chen po bsgom pa rdzogs so zhes bya ba
T02D1660:439a-27: ni mthar thug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1660:439a-29: 'grel pa dag gis mnyam sbyor ni /
T02D1660:439a-30: ma lus gsal bar ma 'grol zhes //
T02D1660:439a-31: mnyam sbyor rgyud las bdag gis ni //
T02D1660:439a-32: gtam du dris pa bzhin du thos //
T02D1660:439a-33: bdag gis rtogs dka' yin na yang //
T02D1660:439a-34: bla ma'i zhabs kyis byin brlabs pas //
T02D1660:439a-35: de don rtsom phyir nyes pa med //
T02D1660:439a-36: de phyir rgyud rgyal rtog pa'i don //
T02D1660:439a-38: 'phags pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02D1660:439a-39: dge ba cung zad gang bsags pa //
T02D1660:439a-40: de yis kun mkhyen thob par shog / sangs rgyas
T02D1660:439a-41: thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1660:439a-42: sgyu ma bde mchog gi 'grel pa mnyam sbyor gyi
T02D1660:439a-43: rgyan zhes bya ba rab dga' rdo rjes mdzad pa
